trans-unit.target: 要傳回的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object of the specified type whose value is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件，該物件屬於指定的類型，且其值等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: A parameter supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 參數提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: An object whose underlying type is <paramref name="typeCode" /> and whose value is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 基礎類型為 <paramref name="typeCode" /> 且值與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的物件。

trans-unit.source: -or-

A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="typeCode" /> is <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" />, <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.String" />, or <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="Nothing" /> 是 <paramref name="value" />，而且 <see langword="null" /> 是 <paramref name="typeCode" />、<see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.String" />，則為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" />)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> is a general-purpose conversion method that converts the object specified by `value` to a predefined type specified by `typeCode`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> 是一般用途的轉換方法，將所指定的物件轉換`value`到預先定義的類型所指定`typeCode`。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter can be an object of any type.
trans-unit.target: `value`參數可以是任何類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: For the conversion to succeed, `value` must implement the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface, because the method simply wraps a call to an appropriate <xref:System.IConvertible> method.
trans-unit.target: 轉換成功，`value`必須實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面，因為方法只會包裝對適當的呼叫<xref:System.IConvertible>方法。

trans-unit.source: The method also requires that conversion of `value` to `typeCode` be supported.
trans-unit.target: 方法也會需要該轉換`value`至`typeCode`受到支援。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method does not support the conversion of `value` to a custom type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法不支援的轉換`value`至自訂類型。

trans-unit.source: To perform such a conversion, call the <xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這類轉換，請呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation that supplies formatting information for the conversion.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作，提供轉換的格式設定資訊。

trans-unit.source: Whether and how this parameter is used depends on the underlying <xref:System.IConvertible> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 是否以及如何使用這個參數會相依於基礎<xref:System.IConvertible>實作。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a base data type, `provider` is used only for the following conversions.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是基底資料型別，`provider`只適用於下列轉換。

trans-unit.source: If a `null`<xref:System.IFormatProvider> argument is passed to these methods, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the current thread culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`null`<xref:System.IFormatProvider>引數傳遞給這些方法，<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用代表目前執行緒文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from a number to a string, or from a string to a number.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的數字為字串，或從一個數字的字串。

trans-unit.source: `provider` must be a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object, a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object, or a custom <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation that returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 必須是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件或自訂<xref:System.IFormatProvider>傳回實作<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method performs the conversion using the default "G" format specifier, the `provider` parameter has no effect if `value` or the target type is an unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法會執行預設"G"格式規範，轉換`provider`參數如果有任何作用`value`或目標類型是不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from a <xref:System.DateTime> value to a string, or from a string to a <xref:System.DateTime> value.
trans-unit.target: 從轉換<xref:System.DateTime>為字串，或從字串到值<xref:System.DateTime>值。

trans-unit.source: `provider` must be a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> or <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 必須是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>或<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is an application-defined type, its <xref:System.IConvertible> implementation may use the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是應用程式定義的型別，其<xref:System.IConvertible>實作可能會使用`provider`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom format provider named `InterceptProvider` that indicates when its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method is called and returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> for the fr-FR culture and a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object for the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例定義名為的自訂格式提供者`InterceptProvider`，指出當其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法呼叫，並傳回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>FR-FR 文化特性和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>EN-US 文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: This format provider is used in all calls to the <xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此格式提供者中的所有呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates an array with a <xref:System.Double> and a <xref:System.DateTime> value and makes repeated calls to <xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> with each value and each member of the <xref:System.TypeCode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立與陣列<xref:System.Double>和<xref:System.DateTime>值，並會重複的呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ChangeType%28System.Object%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>與每個值的每個成員<xref:System.TypeCode>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The example illustrates when the method uses the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> parameter and also illustrates the use of the `provider` parameter to perform culture-sensitive formatting.
trans-unit.target: 此範例說明當此方法會使用<xref:System.IFormatProvider>參數也會說明如何使用和`provider`參數以執行區分文化特性的格式。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="typeCode" /> specifies a value type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，而且 <paramref name="typeCode" /> 會指定實值型別。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in a format for the <paramref name="typeCode" /> type recognized by <paramref name="provider" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 格式不是 <paramref name="provider" /> 所辨識的 <paramref name="typeCode" /> 類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is out of the range of the <paramref name="typeCode" /> type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表超出 <paramref name="typeCode" /> 類型範圍的數字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeCode" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeCode" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: A constant that represents a database column that is absent of data; that is, database null.
trans-unit.target: 常數，表示缺少資料的資料庫資料行，也就是資料庫為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.DBNull> field is equivalent to <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.DBNull>欄位相當於<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode character array.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: A position within <c>inArray</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>inArray</c> 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in <c>inArray</c> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <c>inArray</c> 中要轉換的元素數目。

trans-unit.source: Converts a subset of a Unicode character array, which encodes binary data as base-64 digits, to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer array.
trans-unit.target: 將 Unicode 字元陣列 (將二進位資料編碼為 Base-64 位數) 的子集轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the subset in the input array and the number of elements to convert.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定輸入陣列中的子集，以及要轉換的項目個數。

trans-unit.source: An array of 8-bit unsigned integers equivalent to <paramref name="length" /> elements at position <paramref name="offset" /> in <paramref name="inArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列，與 <paramref name="length" /> 中 <paramref name="offset" /> 位置的 <paramref name="inArray" /> 項目相等。

trans-unit.source: `inArray` is composed of base-64 digits, white-space characters, and trailing padding characters.
trans-unit.target: `inArray` 為 base 64 數字、 空格字元和尾端填補字元所組成。

trans-unit.source: The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", lowercase characters "a" to "z", numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/".
trans-unit.target: 以遞增順序，從零 base 64 數字是否為大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、"0"到"9"的數字和符號"+"和"/"。

trans-unit.source: The white-space characters, and their Unicode names and hexadecimal code points, are tab (CHARACTER TABULATION, U+0009), newline (LINE FEED, U+000A), carriage return (CARRIAGE RETURN, U+000D), and blank (SPACE, U+0020).
trans-unit.target: 空白字元，及其 Unicode 名稱和十六進位的字碼指標，都使用定位字元 （字元表格，U + 0009），新行換行字元 （U + 000A）、 歸位字元 （歸位字元、 U + 000d） 和空白 （空格、 U + 0020）。

trans-unit.source: An arbitrary number of white-space characters can appear in `inArray` because all white-space characters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任意數目的空格字元可出現在`inArray`因為所有的空格字元會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding.
trans-unit.target: 用處的字元，"="做為尾端填補。

trans-unit.source: The end of `inArray` can consist of zero, one, or two padding characters.
trans-unit.target: 結尾`inArray`可以包含零個、 一個或兩個填補字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64CharArray%2A> method is designed to process a single character array that contains all the data to be decoded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64CharArray%2A>方法設計來處理單一字元陣列，其中包含要解碼的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: To decode base-64 character data from a stream, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要解碼資料流的 base-64 字元資料，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64CharArray%28System.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method to decode UUencoded (base-64) data and save it as binary output.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Convert.FromBase64CharArray%28System.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法來解碼 uuencode 編碼 (base-64) 的資料，並將它儲存為二進位輸出。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64CharArray%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Base64FormattingOptions%29> and <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64CharArray%28System.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64CharArray%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Base64FormattingOptions%29>和<xref:System.Convert.FromBase64CharArray%28System.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The input is divided into groups of three bytes (24 bits) each.
trans-unit.target: 輸入會分成三個位元組 （24 位元） 每個群組。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, each group consists of four 6-bit numbers where each number ranges from decimal 0 to 63.
trans-unit.target: 因此，每個群組包含四個每個數字，範圍從十進位的 0 到 63 的 6 位元數字。

trans-unit.source: In this example, there are 85 3-byte groups with one byte remaining.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，有具有一個位元組其餘 85 3 位元組的群組。

trans-unit.source: The first group consists of the hexadecimal values 00, 01, and 02, which yield four 6-bit values equal to decimal 0, 0, 4, and 2.
trans-unit.target: 第一個群組包含 00，01、 02 產生四個十進位的 0、 0、 4 和 2 相等的 6 位元值的十六進位值。

trans-unit.source: Those four values correspond to the base-64 digits, "A", "A", "E", and "C", at the beginning of the output.
trans-unit.target: 這些四個值對應至"base 64 數字、 A"、"A"、"E"和"C"，輸出的開頭。

trans-unit.source: If an integral number of 3-byte groups does not exist, the remaining bytes are effectively padded with zeros to form a complete group.
trans-unit.target: 整數數字 3 位元組的群組不存在，如果剩餘的位元組會有效地以零填補來形成完整的群組。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the value of the last byte is hexadecimal FF.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，最後一個位元組的值為十六進位 FF。

trans-unit.source: The first 6 bits are equal to decimal 63, which corresponds to the base-64 digit "/" at the end of the output, and the next 2 bits are padded with zeros to yield decimal 48, which corresponds to the base-64 digit, "w".
trans-unit.target: 前 6 個位元等於十進位 63，對應為 base 64 數字"/"結尾的輸出，而接下來的 2 位元填補零，以產生十進位 48，對應至 base 64 數字，"w"。

trans-unit.source: The last two 6-bit values are padding and correspond to the valueless padding character, "=".
trans-unit.target: 最後兩個的 6 位元值會填補，並對應至用處填補字元，"="。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="length" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="length" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="length" /> indicates a position not within <paramref name="inArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="length" /> 指示不在 <paramref name="inArray" /> 內的位置。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="inArray" />, ignoring white-space characters, is not zero or a multiple of 4.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 除了空白字元之外的長度不會是零或 4 的倍數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The format of <paramref name="inArray" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 格式無效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inArray" /> contains a non-base-64 character, more than two padding characters, or a non-white-space character among the padding characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 包含一個 Base 64 的字元、兩個以上的填補字元或一個位於填補字元之間的非泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: The string to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的字串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string, which encodes binary data as base-64 digits, to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer array.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的字串 (將二進位資料編碼為 Base-64 位數) 轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of 8-bit unsigned integers that is equivalent to <paramref name="s" />.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數且與 <paramref name="s" /> 相等的陣列。

trans-unit.source: `s` is composed of base-64 digits, white-space characters, and trailing padding characters.
trans-unit.target: `s` 為 base 64 數字、 空格字元和尾端填補字元所組成。

trans-unit.source: The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", lowercase characters "a" to "z", numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/".
trans-unit.target: 以遞增順序，從零 base 64 數字是否為大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、"0"到"9"的數字和符號"+"和"/"。

trans-unit.source: The white-space characters, and their Unicode names and hexadecimal code points, are tab (CHARACTER TABULATION, U+0009), newline (LINE FEED, U+000A), carriage return (CARRIAGE RETURN, U+000D), and blank (SPACE, U+0020).
trans-unit.target: 空白字元，及其 Unicode 名稱和十六進位的字碼指標，都使用定位字元 （字元表格，U + 0009），新行換行字元 （U + 000A）、 歸位字元 （歸位字元、 U + 000d） 和空白 （空格、 U + 0020）。

trans-unit.source: An arbitrary number of white-space characters can appear in `s` because all white-space characters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任意數目的空格字元可出現在`s`因為所有的空格字元會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding.
trans-unit.target: 用處的字元，"="做為尾端填補。

trans-unit.source: The end of `s` can consist of zero, one, or two padding characters.
trans-unit.target: 結尾`s`可以包含零個、 一個或兩個填補字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%2A> method is designed to process a single string that contains all the data to be decoded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%2A>方法設計來處理單一字串，包含要解碼的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: To decode base-64 character data from a stream, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要解碼資料流的 base-64 字元資料，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29> method to convert a byte array to a UUencoded (base-64) string, and then calls the <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%28System.String%29> method to restore the original byte array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29>方法，將位元組陣列轉換 (base-64) uuencode 編碼字串，然後呼叫<xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%28System.String%29>方法，以還原原始的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following is a more complex example that creates a 20-element array of 32-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 以下是更複雜的範例會建立 32 位元整數的 20 個元素陣列。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert each element into a byte array, which it stores in the appropriate position in a buffer by calling the <xref:System.Array.Copy%28System.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會使用<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將每個項目轉換成位元組陣列，它會將儲存在緩衝區中的適當位置呼叫<xref:System.Array.Copy%28System.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This buffer is then passed to the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29> method to create a UUencoded (base-64) string.
trans-unit.target: 這個緩衝區會接著傳遞給<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29>方法建立的 (base-64) uuencode 編碼字串。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%28System.String%29> method to decode the UUencoded string, and calls the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert each set of four bytes (the size of a 32-bit integer) to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%28System.String%29>方法來解碼 uuencode 編碼字串，並呼叫<xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將每一組的四個位元組 （32 位元整數的大小） 轉換成整數。

trans-unit.source: The output from the example shows that the original array has been successfully restored.
trans-unit.target: 範例輸出顯示已成功還原原始的陣列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="s" />, ignoring white-space characters, is not zero or a multiple of 4.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 除了空白字元之外的長度不會是零或 4 的倍數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The format of <paramref name="s" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 格式無效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> contains a non-base-64 character, more than two padding characters, or a non-white space-character among the padding characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 包含一個非 Base 64 的字元、兩個以上的填補字元或一個位於填補字元間的非泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" /> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定物件的 <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" /> for <paramref name="value" />, or <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" /> 的 <paramref name="value" />；如果 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" /> 為 <paramref name="value" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object.
trans-unit.target: 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an indication whether the specified object is of type <see cref="T:System.DBNull" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定物件是否屬於類型 <see cref="T:System.DBNull" /> 的指示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is of type <see cref="T:System.DBNull" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 屬於類型 <paramref name="value" />，則為 <see cref="T:System.DBNull" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.IsDBNull%2A> method tests whether the `value` parameter is equal to <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.IsDBNull%2A>方法測試是否`value`參數等於<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to the following code:
trans-unit.target: 相當於下列程式碼：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType> is used to indicate a value that is missing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType> 用來指出遺漏的值。

trans-unit.source: It is not equivalent to `null` or to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 不等於`null`或<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, code such as `Convert.IsDBNull(null)` in C# or `Convert.IsDBNull(Nothing)` in Visual Basic returns`false`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，程式碼如`Convert.IsDBNull(null)`在 C# 或`Convert.IsDBNull(Nothing)`Visual Basic 傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> object to retrieve survey data from a database.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>調查資料擷取的資料庫物件。

trans-unit.source: It assigns each row's field values to an array, and then passes each array element to the <xref:System.Convert.IsDBNull%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它會指派一個陣列，每個資料列的欄位值，然後將每個陣列項目<xref:System.Convert.IsDBNull%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the method returns `true`, the example assigns the string "NA" to the array element.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會傳回`true`，此範例會將字串"NA"指派給陣列元素。

trans-unit.source: The array is then added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 接著會加入至陣列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Converts a subset of an 8-bit unsigned integer array to an equivalent subset of a Unicode character array encoded with base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列的子集，轉換為相等的 Base-64 位數編碼的 Unicode 字元陣列子集。

trans-unit.source: An input array of 8-bit unsigned integers.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數的輸入陣列。

trans-unit.source: A position within <c>inArray</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>inArray</c> 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements of <c>inArray</c> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 <c>inArray</c> 元素數目。

trans-unit.source: An output array of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 字元的輸出陣列。

trans-unit.source: A position within <c>outArray</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>outArray</c> 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Converts a subset of an 8-bit unsigned integer array to an equivalent subset of a Unicode character array encoded with base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列的子集，轉換為相等的 Base-64 位數編碼的 Unicode 字元陣列子集。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the subsets as offsets in the input and output arrays, and the number of elements in the input array to convert.
trans-unit.target: 參數會將子集指定為輸入和輸出陣列中的位移，以及轉換輸入陣列中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer containing the number of bytes in <paramref name="outArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數，包含 <paramref name="outArray" /> 中的位元數。

trans-unit.source: The subset of `length` elements of `inArray` starting at position `offsetIn`, are taken as a numeric value and converted to a subset of elements in `outArray` starting at position `offsetOut`.
trans-unit.target: 子集`length`的項目`inArray`位置開始`offsetIn`視為數值和轉換中的項目子集，`outArray`位置開始`offsetOut`。

trans-unit.source: The return value indicates the number of converted elements in `outArray`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值會指出轉換中的元素數目`outArray`。

trans-unit.source: The subset of `outArray` consists of base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 子集`outArray`base 64 數字所組成。

trans-unit.source: The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/".
trans-unit.target: Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。

trans-unit.source: The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding.
trans-unit.target: 用處的字元，"="做為尾端填補。

trans-unit.source: The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers.
trans-unit.target: `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。

trans-unit.source: The `offsetIn` and `offsetOut` parameters are zero-based array positions.
trans-unit.target: `offsetIn`和`offsetOut`參數都是以零為起始的陣列位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64CharArray%2A> method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64CharArray%2A>方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: To create a base-64 character array from a byte stream, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要從位元組資料流建立 base-64 字元陣列，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64CharArray%2A> method to UUencode (encode in base 64) a binary stream, then save the encoding to a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64CharArray%2A>UUencode 方法 （格式為 base 64 編碼） 二進位資料流，然後儲存至檔案的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inArray" /> or <paramref name="outArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 或 <paramref name="outArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offsetIn" />, <paramref name="offsetOut" />, or <paramref name="length" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offsetIn" />、<paramref name="offsetOut" /> 或 <paramref name="length" /> 是負數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offsetIn" /> plus <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="inArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offsetIn" /> 加上 <paramref name="length" /> 大於 <paramref name="inArray" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offsetOut" /> plus the number of elements to return is greater than the length of <paramref name="outArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offsetOut" /> 加上要傳回的元素數目大於 <paramref name="outArray" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: An input array of 8-bit unsigned integers.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數的輸入陣列。

trans-unit.source: A position within <c>inArray</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>inArray</c> 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements of <c>inArray</c> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 <c>inArray</c> 元素數目。

trans-unit.source: An output array of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 字元的輸出陣列。

trans-unit.source: A position within <c>outArray</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>outArray</c> 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks" /> to insert a line break every 76 characters, or <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.None" /> to not insert line breaks.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks" /> 以便於每 76 個字元之後插入分行符號，或是 <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.None" /> 不插入分行符號。

trans-unit.source: Converts a subset of an 8-bit unsigned integer array to an equivalent subset of a Unicode character array encoded with base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列的子集，轉換為相等的 Base-64 位數編碼的 Unicode 字元陣列子集。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the subsets as offsets in the input and output arrays, the number of elements in the input array to convert, and whether line breaks are inserted in the output array.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定可在輸入和輸出陣列中當成位移 (Offset) 的子集、輸入陣列中要轉換的項目個數，以及是否要在輸出陣列中插入分行符號。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer containing the number of bytes in <paramref name="outArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數，包含 <paramref name="outArray" /> 中的位元數。

trans-unit.source: The subset of `length` elements of the `inArray` parameter starting at position `offsetIn`, are taken as a numeric value and converted to a subset of elements in the `outArray` parameter starting at position `offsetOut`.
trans-unit.target: 子集`length`的項目`inArray`參數的位置開始`offsetIn`視為數值和轉換中的項目子集，`outArray`參數的位置開始`offsetOut`。

trans-unit.source: The return value indicates the number of converted elements in `outArray`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值會指出轉換中的元素數目`outArray`。

trans-unit.source: The subset of `outArray` consists of base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 子集`outArray`base 64 數字所組成。

trans-unit.source: The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/".
trans-unit.target: Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。

trans-unit.source: The valueless character "=" is used for trailing padding.
trans-unit.target: 用處字元"="用於尾端填補。

trans-unit.source: The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers.
trans-unit.target: `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。

trans-unit.source: The `offsetIn` and `offsetOut` parameters are zero-based array positions.
trans-unit.target: `offsetIn`和`offsetOut`參數都是以零為起始的陣列位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64CharArray%2A> method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64CharArray%2A>方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: To create a base-64 character array from a byte stream, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要從位元組資料流建立 base-64 字元陣列，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: If the `options` parameter is set to <xref:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks> and the output of the conversion is longer than 76 characters, a line break is inserted every 76 characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`參數設定為<xref:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks>和轉換的輸出是超過 76 個字元，就會插入分行符號每 76 個字元。

trans-unit.source: A line break is defined as a carriage return character (U+000D) followed by a line feed character (U+000A).
trans-unit.target: 分行符號的定義是歸位字元 (U + 000d) 後面接著行換頁字元 (U + 000A)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see RFC 2045, "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions", at [http://www.rfc-editor.org/](http://www.rfc-editor.org/).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2045，「 多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 」，網址[ http://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](http://www.rfc-editor.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64CharArray%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64CharArray%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The input is divided into groups of three bytes (24 bits) each.
trans-unit.target: 輸入會分成三個位元組 （24 位元） 每個群組。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, each group consists of four 6-bit numbers where each number ranges from decimal 0 to 63.
trans-unit.target: 因此，每個群組包含四個每個數字，範圍從十進位的 0 到 63 的 6 位元數字。

trans-unit.source: In this example, there are 85 3-byte groups with one byte remaining.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，有具有一個位元組其餘 85 3 位元組的群組。

trans-unit.source: The first group consists of the hexadecimal values 00, 01, and 02, which yield four 6-bit values equal to decimal 0, 0, 4, and 2.
trans-unit.target: 第一個群組包含 00，01、 02 產生四個十進位的 0、 0、 4 和 2 相等的 6 位元值的十六進位值。

trans-unit.source: Those four values correspond to the base-64 digits "A", "A", "E", and "C" at the beginning of the output.
trans-unit.target: 這些四個值對應至 base 64 數字"A"、"A"、"E"和"C"開頭的輸出。

trans-unit.source: If an integral number of 3-byte groups does not exist, the remaining bytes are effectively padded with zeros to form a complete group.
trans-unit.target: 整數數字 3 位元組的群組不存在，如果剩餘的位元組會有效地以零填補來形成完整的群組。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the value of the last byte is hexadecimal FF.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，最後一個位元組的值為十六進位 FF。

trans-unit.source: The first 6 bits are equal to decimal 63, which corresponds to the base-64 digit "/" at the end of the output, and the next 2 bits are padded with zeros to yield decimal 48, which corresponds to the base-64 digit, "w".
trans-unit.target: 前 6 個位元等於十進位 63，對應為 base 64 數字"/"結尾的輸出，而接下來的 2 位元填補零，以產生十進位 48，對應至 base 64 數字，"w"。

trans-unit.source: The last two 6-bit values are padding and correspond to the valueless padding character, "=".
trans-unit.target: 最後兩個的 6 位元值會填補，並對應至用處填補字元，"="。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inArray" /> or <paramref name="outArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 或 <paramref name="outArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offsetIn" />, <paramref name="offsetOut" />, or <paramref name="length" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offsetIn" />、<paramref name="offsetOut" /> 或 <paramref name="length" /> 是負數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offsetIn" /> plus <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="inArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offsetIn" /> 加上 <paramref name="length" /> 大於 <paramref name="inArray" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offsetOut" /> plus the number of elements to return is greater than the length of <paramref name="outArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offsetOut" /> 加上要傳回的元素數目大於 <paramref name="outArray" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Base64FormattingOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Base64FormattingOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列的值，轉換為使用 Base-64 位數編碼的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: An array of 8-bit unsigned integers.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Converts an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列，轉換為使用 Base-64 位數編碼的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation, in base 64, of the contents of <paramref name="inArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 之內容的字串表示 (格式為 Base 64)。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `inArray` are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 項目`inArray`以數值形式拍攝且轉換為使用 base-64 位數編碼的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/".
trans-unit.target: Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。

trans-unit.source: The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding.
trans-unit.target: 用處的字元，"="做為尾端填補。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A> method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A>方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: To encode data from a stream, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼的資料流的資料，請使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A> method is not used to round-trip a UUEncoded (base-64 encoded) string.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A>方法不是用來反覆存取使用 uuencode 編碼 (base 64 編碼) 字串。

trans-unit.source: That is, if you decode a string by calling the <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%2A> method, then encode the returned byte array by calling the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A> method, the resulting string will not necessarily be identical to the original string.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，如果您藉由呼叫解碼字串<xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%2A>方法，然後將傳回的位元組陣列編碼藉由呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A>方法，產生的字串不一定會有相同的原始字串。

trans-unit.source: The string will round-trip only if the original string is a valid base-64 encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 字串會存取，只有原始字串是有效的 base-64 編碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29> method to convert a byte array to a UUencoded (base-64) string, and then calls the <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%28System.String%29> method to restore the original byte array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29>方法，將位元組陣列轉換 (base-64) uuencode 編碼字串，然後呼叫<xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%28System.String%29>方法，以還原原始的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following is a more complex example that creates a 20-element array of 32-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 以下是更複雜的範例會建立 32 位元整數的 20 個元素陣列。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert each element into a byte array, which it stores in the appropriate position in a buffer by calling the <xref:System.Array.Copy%28System.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會使用<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將每個項目轉換成位元組陣列，它會將儲存在緩衝區中的適當位置呼叫<xref:System.Array.Copy%28System.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Array%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This buffer is then passed to the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29> method to create a UUencoded (base-64) string.
trans-unit.target: 這個緩衝區會接著傳遞給<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29>方法建立的 (base-64) uuencode 編碼字串。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%28System.String%29> method to decode the UUencoded string, and calls the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert each set of four bytes (the size of a 32-bit integer) to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%28System.String%29>方法來解碼 uuencode 編碼字串，並呼叫<xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將每一組的四個位元組 （32 位元整數的大小） 轉換成整數。

trans-unit.source: The output from the example shows that the original array has been successfully restored.
trans-unit.target: 範例輸出顯示已成功還原原始的陣列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of 8-bit unsigned integers.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數的陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks" /> to insert a line break every 76 characters, or <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.None" /> to not insert line breaks.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks" /> 以便於每 76 個字元之後插入分行符號，或是 <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.None" /> 不插入分行符號。

trans-unit.source: Converts an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列，轉換為使用 Base-64 位數編碼的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A parameter specifies whether to insert line breaks in the return value.
trans-unit.target: 參數可指定是否要在傳回值中插入分行符號。

trans-unit.source: The string representation in base 64 of the elements in <paramref name="inArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 中項目的字串表示 (格式為 Base 64)。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the `inArray` parameter are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation in base 64.
trans-unit.target: 項目`inArray`參數會被視為數字的值，轉換為 base 64 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/".
trans-unit.target: Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。

trans-unit.source: The valueless character "=" is used for trailing padding.
trans-unit.target: 用處字元"="用於尾端填補。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A> method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A>方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: To encode data from a stream, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼的資料流的資料，請使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: If the `options` parameter is set to <xref:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks> and the output of the conversion is longer than 76 characters, a line break is inserted every 76 characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`參數設定為<xref:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks>和轉換的輸出是超過 76 個字元，就會插入分行符號每 76 個字元。

trans-unit.source: A line break is defined as a carriage return character (U+000D) followed by a line feed character (U+000A).
trans-unit.target: 分行符號的定義是歸位字元 (U + 000d) 後面接著行換頁字元 (U + 000A)。

trans-unit.source: Because line breaks are considered whitespace characters in a base-64 encoding, they are ignored when converting a base-64 encoded string back to a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 因為分行符號會被視為空白字元以 base 64 編碼方式，將會忽略轉換 base 64 編碼字串的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The line breaks are simply convenient when displaying the encoded string to a control or a device such as a console window.
trans-unit.target: 對控制項或裝置，例如主控台視窗中顯示編碼的字串時，插入換行符號會只是很方便。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see RFC 2045, "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions", at [http://www.rfc-editor.org/](http://www.rfc-editor.org/).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2045，「 多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 」，網址[ http://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](http://www.rfc-editor.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Base64FormattingOptions%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> with a <xref:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks?displayProperty=nameWithType> argument to insert line breaks in the string that is produced by encoding a 100-element byte array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Base64FormattingOptions%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks?displayProperty=nameWithType>插入列的引數會中斷已編碼所產生的 100 個元素的位元組陣列的字串。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the example shows, the <xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> succeeds in restoring the original byte array; the line break characters are ignored during the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 做為範例所示，從輸出<xref:System.Convert.FromBase64String%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>成功地還原原始的位元組陣列則分行符號字元會在轉換期間忽略。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Base64FormattingOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Base64FormattingOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An array of 8-bit unsigned integers.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An offset in <c>inArray</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>inArray</c> 中的位移。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements of <c>inArray</c> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 <c>inArray</c> 元素數目。

trans-unit.source: Converts a subset of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列子集，轉換為使用 Base-64 位數編碼的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the subset as an offset in the input array, and the number of elements in the array to convert.
trans-unit.target: 參數會將子集指定為輸入陣列中的位移 (Offset)，以及所要轉換陣列中項目的個數。

trans-unit.source: The string representation in base 64 of <paramref name="length" /> elements of <paramref name="inArray" />, starting at position <paramref name="offset" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 中開始於位置 <paramref name="inArray" /> 之 <paramref name="offset" /> 項目的字串表示 (格式為 Base 64)。

trans-unit.source: The elements of `inArray` are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation in base 64.
trans-unit.target: 項目`inArray`會被視為數字的值，轉換為的字串表示，格式為 base 64。

trans-unit.source: The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/".
trans-unit.target: Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。

trans-unit.source: The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding.
trans-unit.target: 用處的字元，"="做為尾端填補。

trans-unit.source: The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers.
trans-unit.target: `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。

trans-unit.source: The `offset` parameter is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: `offset`參數以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A> method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A>方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: To encode data from a stream, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼的資料流的資料，請使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="length" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="length" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="inArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="length" /> 大於 <paramref name="inArray" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: An array of 8-bit unsigned integers.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An offset in <c>inArray</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>inArray</c> 中的位移。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements of <c>inArray</c> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 <c>inArray</c> 元素數目。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks" /> to insert a line break every 76 characters, or <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.None" /> to not insert line breaks.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks" /> 以便於每 76 個字元之後插入分行符號，或是 <see cref="F:System.Base64FormattingOptions.None" /> 不插入分行符號。

trans-unit.source: Converts a subset of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列子集，轉換為使用 Base-64 位數編碼的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the subset as an offset in the input array, the number of elements in the array to convert, and whether to insert line breaks in the return value.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定可在輸入陣列中當成位移 (Offset) 的子集、輸入陣列中要轉換的項目個數，以及是否要在傳回值中插入分行符號。

trans-unit.source: The string representation in base 64 of <paramref name="length" /> elements of <paramref name="inArray" />, starting at position <paramref name="offset" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 中開始於位置 <paramref name="inArray" /> 之 <paramref name="offset" /> 項目的字串表示 (格式為 Base 64)。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the `inArray` parameter are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation in base 64.
trans-unit.target: 項目`inArray`參數會被視為數字的值，轉換為 base 64 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/".
trans-unit.target: Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。

trans-unit.source: The valueless character "=" is used for trailing padding.
trans-unit.target: 用處字元"="用於尾端填補。

trans-unit.source: The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers.
trans-unit.target: `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。

trans-unit.source: The `offset` parameter is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: `offset`參數以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A> method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A>方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: To encode data from a stream, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼的資料流的資料，請使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ToBase64Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: If the `options` parameter is set to <xref:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks> and the output of the conversion is longer than 76 characters, a line break is inserted every 76 characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`參數設定為<xref:System.Base64FormattingOptions.InsertLineBreaks>和轉換的輸出是超過 76 個字元，就會插入分行符號每 76 個字元。

trans-unit.source: A line break is defined as a carriage return character (U+000D) followed by a line feed character (U+000A).
trans-unit.target: 分行符號的定義是歸位字元 (U + 000d) 後面接著行換頁字元 (U + 000A)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see RFC 2045, "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions", at [http://www.rfc-editor.org/](http://www.rfc-editor.org/).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2045，「 多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 」，網址[ http://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](http://www.rfc-editor.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Convert.ToBase64String%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The input is divided into groups of three bytes (24 bits) each.
trans-unit.target: 輸入會分成三個位元組 （24 位元） 每個群組。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, each group consists of four 6-bit numbers where each number ranges from decimal 0 to 63.
trans-unit.target: 因此，每個群組包含四個每個數字，範圍從十進位的 0 到 63 的 6 位元數字。

trans-unit.source: In this example, there are 85 3-byte groups with one byte remaining.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，有具有一個位元組其餘 85 3 位元組的群組。

trans-unit.source: The first group consists of the hexadecimal values 00, 01, and 02, which yield four 6-bit values equal to decimal 0, 0, 4, and 2.
trans-unit.target: 第一個群組包含 00，01、 02 產生四個十進位的 0、 0、 4 和 2 相等的 6 位元值的十六進位值。

trans-unit.source: Those four values correspond to the base-64 digits "A", "A", "E", and "C" at the beginning of the output.
trans-unit.target: 這些四個值對應至 base 64 數字"A"、"A"、"E"和"C"開頭的輸出。

trans-unit.source: If an integral number of 3-byte groups does not exist, the remaining bytes are effectively padded with zeros to form a complete group.
trans-unit.target: 整數數字 3 位元組的群組不存在，如果剩餘的位元組會有效地以零填補來形成完整的群組。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the value of the last byte is hexadecimal FF.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，最後一個位元組的值為十六進位 FF。

trans-unit.source: The first 6 bits are equal to decimal 63, which corresponds to the base-64 digit "/" at the end of the output, and the next 2 bits are padded with zeros to yield decimal 48, which corresponds to the base-64 digit, "w".
trans-unit.target: 前 6 個位元等於十進位 63，對應為 base 64 數字"/"結尾的輸出，而接下來的 2 位元填補零，以產生十進位 48，對應至 base 64 數字，"w"。

trans-unit.source: The last two 6-bit values are padding and correspond to the valueless padding character, "=".
trans-unit.target: 最後兩個的 6 位元值會填補，並對應至用處填補字元，"="。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inArray" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inArray" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="length" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="length" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="length" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="inArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="length" /> 大於 <paramref name="inArray" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Base64FormattingOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Base64FormattingOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified value to an equivalent Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為相等的布林值。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified Boolean value; no actual conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的布林值 (Boolean)；不會執行實際的轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 傳回未變更的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 8 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is not zero; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 不是零，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an array of <xref:System.Byte> values to <xref:System.Boolean> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將陣列轉換<xref:System.Byte>值<xref:System.Boolean>值。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法一律會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: The date and time value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法一律會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates that an attempt to convert a <xref:System.DateTime> value to a Boolean type throws <xref:System.InvalidCastException>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範，嘗試將轉換<xref:System.DateTime>布林類型的值會擲回<xref:System.InvalidCastException>。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified decimal number to an equivalent Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之十進位數字的值，轉換為相等的布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is not zero; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 不是零，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of a specified object to an equivalent Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之物件的值轉換為相等的布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" />, which reflects the value returned by invoking the <see cref="M:System.IConvertible.ToBoolean(System.IFormatProvider)" /> method for the underlying type of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="false" />，其會反映為 <see cref="M:System.IConvertible.ToBoolean(System.IFormatProvider)" /> 的基礎類型所叫用之 <paramref name="value" /> 方法所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />, the method returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，則方法會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an array of object values to <xref:System.Boolean> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的物件值陣列<xref:System.Boolean>值。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 是一個不等於 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" /> 的字串。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

The conversion of <paramref name="value" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援將 <paramref name="value" /> 轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 8 位元帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的布林值。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將陣列轉換<xref:System.Single>值<xref:System.Boolean>值。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the value of either <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" /> or <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a logical value to its Boolean equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之邏輯值的字串表示，轉換為相等的布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" />, or <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="value" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see langword="true" /> 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 時為 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" />，否則，當 <see langword="false" /> 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" /> 時，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For a successful conversion to occur, the `value` parameter must equal either <xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType>, a constant whose value is `True`, <xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType>, a constant whose value is `False`, or it must be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 成功轉換發生時，`value`參數必須等於 <xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其值為常數`True`， <xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType>，常數，其值是`False`，或必須是`null`。

trans-unit.source: In comparing `value` with <xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method ignores case as well as leading and trailing white space.
trans-unit.target: 在比較`value`與<xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType>，這個方法會忽略大小寫也為開頭和尾端空白字元。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Boolean.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Boolean.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Convert.ToBoolean%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert various strings to Boolean values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Convert.ToBoolean%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將各種字串轉換成布林值。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件，或是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to an equivalent Boolean value, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為相等的布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" />, which reflects the value returned by invoking the <see cref="M:System.IConvertible.ToBoolean(System.IFormatProvider)" /> method for the underlying type of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="false" />，其會反映為 <see cref="M:System.IConvertible.ToBoolean(System.IFormatProvider)" /> 的基礎類型所叫用之 <paramref name="value" /> 方法所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />, the method returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，則方法會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore the `provider` parameter; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`參數; 不過，此參數可能會使用`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> and a class that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義一個類別，實作<xref:System.IConvertible>和類別可實作<xref:System.IFormatProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Objects of the class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> hold an array of <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 實作類別的物件<xref:System.IConvertible>保存陣列<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: An object of each class is passed to the <xref:System.Convert.ToBoolean%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 每個類別的物件傳遞至<xref:System.Convert.ToBoolean%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if any of the non-discarded array values are non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`true`如果非捨棄陣列任何的值非零。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IFormatProvider> object determines how elements are discarded for this calculation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IFormatProvider>物件可以決定如何將項目會捨棄這項計算。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is a string that does not equal <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" /> or <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 是一個不等於 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" /> 的字串。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

The conversion of <paramref name="value" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> is not supported.

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a logical value to its Boolean equivalent, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之邏輯值的字串表示轉換為相等的布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" />, or <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="value" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see langword="true" /> 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 時為 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" />，否則，當 <see langword="false" /> 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" /> 時，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Boolean.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Boolean.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not equal to <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" /> or <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不等於 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.TrueString" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Boolean.FalseString" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified value to an 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Boolean value to the equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The number 1 if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則為數字 1，否則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the conversion of <xref:System.Boolean> to <xref:System.Byte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明的轉換<xref:System.Boolean>至<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified 8-bit unsigned integer; no actual conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 8 位元不帶正負號整數；不會執行實際的轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 傳回未變更的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified Unicode character to the equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 Unicode 字元值轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an unsigned byte value that represents the numeric code of the <xref:System.Char> object passed to it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回不帶正負號的位元組值，表示的數字的代碼<xref:System.Char>物件傳遞給它。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework, a <xref:System.Char> object is a 16-bit value.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Char>物件是 16 位元值。

trans-unit.source: This means that the method is suitable for returning the numeric codes of characters in the ASCII character range or in the Unicode C0 Controls and Basic Latin, and C1 Controls and Latin-1 Supplement ranges, from U+0000 to U+00FF.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，該方法是適用於字元的 ascii 或 Unicode C0 控制項和基本拉丁文，和 C1 控制項以及拉丁文 1 補充資訊的範圍，從 U + 0000 到 U + 00FF 中傳回的字元數字的代碼。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an array of <xref:System.Char> values to <xref:System.Byte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將陣列轉換<xref:System.Char>值<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表一個大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: The date and time value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法一律會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified decimal number to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之十進位數字的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，捨入至最接近的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts a <xref:System.Byte> value to a <xref:System.Decimal> and a <xref:System.Decimal> value to a <xref:System.Byte>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Byte>值設定為<xref:System.Decimal>和<xref:System.Decimal>值設定為<xref:System.Byte>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The double-precision floating-point number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified double-precision floating-point number to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之雙精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，捨入至最接近的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts a <xref:System.Byte> value to a <xref:System.Double> and a <xref:System.Double> value to a <xref:System.Byte>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Byte>值設定為<xref:System.Double>和<xref:System.Double>值設定為<xref:System.Byte>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 16-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 16-bit signed integer to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 16 位元帶正負號的整數值轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將陣列轉換<xref:System.Int16>值<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 32 位元帶正負號的整數值轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。
