trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 64-bit signed integer to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 64 位元帶正負號的整數值轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an array of <xref:System.Int64> values to <xref:System.Byte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將陣列轉換<xref:System.Int64>值<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件，或是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to an 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之物件的值轉換為 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="value" />；而若 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is not `null`, this method wraps a call to the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToByte%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`不`null`，這個方法會包裝呼叫<xref:System.IConvertible.ToByte%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的基礎類型的實作`value`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.Object%29> method to convert an array of objects to <xref:System.Byte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.Object%29>方法，將轉換的物件陣列<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in the property format for a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是使用 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 值的屬性格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 沒有實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Conversion from <paramref name="value" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> type is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援從 <paramref name="value" /> 轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit signed integer to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit signed integer to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 8 位元帶正負號的整數值轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an array of <xref:System.SByte> values to <xref:System.Byte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將陣列轉換<xref:System.SByte>值<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified single-precision floating-point number to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之單精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，捨入至最接近的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts a <xref:System.Single> value to a <xref:System.Byte>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Single>值設定為<xref:System.Byte>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="value" />；而若 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%29> method is equivalent to passing `value` to the <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%29>方法相當於傳遞`value`至<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: `value` is interpreted by using the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: `value` 是使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例來解譯。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Byte.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a string array and attempts to convert each string to a <xref:System.Byte>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例定義的字串陣列，並嘗試將每個將字串轉換為<xref:System.Byte>。

trans-unit.source: Note that while a `null` string parses to zero, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，當`null`字串剖析為零，<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: Also note that while leading and trailing spaces parse successfully, formatting symbols, such as currency symbols, group separators, or decimal separators, do not.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，雖然開頭和尾端空白剖析成功，格式化符號，例如貨幣符號群組分隔符號或小數分隔符號，則否。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: The 16-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 16-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 16 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an array of unsigned 16-bit integers to <xref:System.Byte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將以不帶正負號的 16 位元整數的陣列，轉換<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 32-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 32-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 32 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an array of unsigned integers to <xref:System.Byte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換至不帶正負號整數的陣列<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 64-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 64 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an array of unsigned long integers to <xref:System.Byte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換至不帶正負號長整數的陣列<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to an 8-bit unsigned integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="value" />；而若 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `ByteString` class that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例定義一個實作 `ByteString` 介面的 <xref:System.IConvertible> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The class stores the string representation of a byte value along with a sign field, so that it is able to represent both signed and unsigned byte values.
trans-unit.target: 類別會儲存符號欄位，以及一個位元組值的字串表示，使其能夠表示這兩個位元組帶正負號和不帶正負號的位元組值。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates several `ByteString` objects and calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method to convert them to byte values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將數個會具現化`ByteString`物件並呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>將它們轉換成位元組值的方法。

trans-unit.source: It illustrates that the <xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method wraps a call to the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToByte%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the object to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 它說明了<xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法會包裝呼叫<xref:System.IConvertible.ToByte%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>要轉換之物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in the property format for a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是使用 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 值的屬性格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 沒有實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Conversion from <paramref name="value" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> type is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援從 <paramref name="value" /> 轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer, using specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數，等於 <paramref name="value" />；而若 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Byte.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Byte.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that defines the positive sign as "pos" and the negative sign as "neg", which it uses in calls to the <xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件，用以定義"協商"，它會使用呼叫中的 「 位置 」 和負號為正號<xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method repeatedly to convert each element in a string array to a <xref:System.Byte> value.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法重複，將轉換的字串陣列中每個項目<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Byte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: The base of the number in <c>value</c>, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 中數字的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified base to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定基底中數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X".
trans-unit.target: 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Byte> data type supports unsigned values only, the <xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Byte>資料型別支援不帶正負號的值僅<xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。

trans-unit.source: In other words, all eight bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，所有的八位元用來表示數字的值，並正負號位元不存在。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed byte value that is out of the range of the <xref:System.Byte> data type is converted to a <xref:System.Byte> value without the method throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的位元組值，超出的範圍<xref:System.Byte>資料類型轉換成<xref:System.Byte>值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts <xref:System.SByte.MinValue> to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.SByte.MinValue>其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x80 converts to 128."
trans-unit.target: 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x80 轉換成 128。

trans-unit.source: When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value.
trans-unit.target: 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律驗證方法或運算子使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use unsigned binary representation when it converts a hexadecimal string representation to a <xref:System.Byte> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明的技巧，確保，該方法不適當地使用不帶正負號的二進位表示將轉換的十六進位字串表示的<xref:System.Byte>值。

trans-unit.source: The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。

trans-unit.source: When the example converts the value back to a <xref:System.Byte> value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 值在此範例會將轉換已返回<xref:System.Byte>值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the value is negative and that it uses two's complement instead of unsigned binary representation), the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 因此，和其高序位位元會設 （這表示的值為負數且它會使用兩個互補而不是不帶正負號的二進位表示法），在方法擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example alternately attempts to interpret an array of strings as the representation of binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例或者嘗試將字串陣列，則會解譯為二進位、 八進位、 十進位和十六進位值的表示法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 64-bit unsigned integer to its equivalent Unicode character.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 64 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為它的相等 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode character that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 字元，其與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of unsigned long integers to a <xref:System.Char> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換至不帶正負號長整數的陣列中每個項目<xref:System.Char>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Char.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Char.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to its equivalent Unicode character, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為它的相等 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode character that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or <see cref="F:System.Char.MinValue" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 Unicode 字元；如果 <see cref="F:System.Char.MinValue" /> 為 <paramref name="value" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToChar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToChar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> and a class that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義一個類別，實作<xref:System.IConvertible>和類別可實作<xref:System.IFormatProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Objects of the class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> hold an array of <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 實作類別的物件<xref:System.IConvertible>保存陣列<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: An object of each class is passed to the `ToChar` method.
trans-unit.target: 每個類別的物件傳遞至`ToChar`方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a character whose Unicode value is the average of the array of <xref:System.Double> values, using the object that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider> to determine how to calculate the average.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回字元的 Unicode 值是一維陣列的平均<xref:System.Double>，使用值實作的物件<xref:System.IFormatProvider>來判斷如何計算平均。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is a null string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 是一個 Null 字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The conversion of <paramref name="value" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Char" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援將 <paramref name="value" /> 轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Char" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.Char.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Char.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.Char.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Char.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A string of length 1 or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 1 或 <see langword="null" /> 的字串。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: Converts the first character of a specified string to a Unicode character, using specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之字串的第一個字元轉換為 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode character that is equivalent to the first and only character in <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中第一且唯一的字元相等之 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: `value` must be a string that contains a single character.
trans-unit.target: `value` 必須是包含單一字元的字串。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Char.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Char.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts a string representation of a <xref:System.Char> value with the `ToChar` method, using an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> object that displays the type of the format provider for which it is called.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的字串表示法<xref:System.Char>值與`ToChar`方法，使用<xref:System.IFormatProvider>顯示的格式提供者，它會呼叫其類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: The example shows that the format provider is not referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示的格式提供者不參考。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="value" /> is not 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的長度不為 1。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件，或是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之物件的值轉換為 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The date and time equivalent of the value of <paramref name="value" />, or a date and time equivalent of <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 值相等的日期和時間；如果 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> 為 <paramref name="value" />，則為與 <see langword="null" /> 相等的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: For the conversion to succeed, the runtime type of the `value` parameter must be either a <xref:System.DateTime> or a <xref:System.String>, or `value` must be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要成功，則執行階段型別轉換`value`參數必須是<xref:System.DateTime>或<xref:System.String>，或`value`必須`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the method throws an <xref:System.InvalidCastException>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，方法會擲回<xref:System.InvalidCastException>。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if `value` is a string, it must contain a valid representation of a date and time value in the current culture or a <xref:System.FormatException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果`value`是一個字串，它必須包含在目前的文化特性的日期和時間值的有效表示法或<xref:System.FormatException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToDateTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToDateTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToDateTime%28System.Object%29> method with a variety of <xref:System.Object> variables.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToDateTime%28System.Object%29>具有各種不同的方法<xref:System.Object>變數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a valid date and time value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是日期及時間值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

The conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援轉換。

trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to an equivalent date and time value.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之日期和時間的字串表示，轉換為相等的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: The date and time equivalent of the value of <paramref name="value" />, or the date and time equivalent of <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 值相等的日期和時間；如果 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> 為 <paramref name="value" />，則為與 <see langword="null" /> 相等的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is not `null`, the return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on `value` using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is initialized for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`不`null`，則傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`value`使用中的格式設定資訊<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>初始化目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `value` argument must contain the representation of a date and time in one of the formats described in the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> topic.
trans-unit.target: `value`引數必須包含日期表示法，而且其中一種格式的時間述<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>主題。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is `null`, the method returns <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `value` 是 `null`，則方法會傳回 <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This method tries to parse `value` completely and avoid throwing a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試剖析`value`完全並避免擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: It completes missing month, day, and year information with the current date.
trans-unit.target: 完成遺漏月、 日和年資訊以目前的日期。

trans-unit.source: If `value` contains only a date and no time, this method assumes a time of midnight.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`包含的日期和沒有時間中，這個方法會假設午夜的時間。

trans-unit.source: Any leading, inner, or trailing white-space characters in `value` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 前置、 內部或尾端空格字元`value`都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Convert.ToDateTime%2A> method to convert various string representations of dates and times to <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Convert.ToDateTime%2A>方法，將轉換的日期和時間的各種字串表示法<xref:System.DateTime>值。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `value` is a <xref:System.String> that represents a date, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that date.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`value`是<xref:System.String>表示日期，`provider`可能會提供用來表示該日期的表示法的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is involved in the conversion of `value` if the runtime type of `value` is a <xref:System.String>, or if `value` is a user-defined type whose <xref:System.IConvertible.ToDateTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation makes use of `provider`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 轉換的`value`執行階段類型，是否`value`是<xref:System.String>，或如果`value`是使用者定義類型的<xref:System.IConvertible.ToDateTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作利用`provider`。

trans-unit.source: If the runtime type of `value` is <xref:System.String> and `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the current thread culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段類型，是否`value`是<xref:System.String>和`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用代表目前執行緒文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom format provider, `CustomProvider`, whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method outputs a message to the console that it has been invoked, and then returns the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object of the culture whose name was passed as a parameter to its class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義自訂的格式提供者， `CustomProvider`、 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法輸出至主控台，它已叫用，然後傳回訊息<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>文化特性名稱做為參數傳遞給它的類別物件建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Each of these `CustomProvider` objects is used to convert the elements in an object array to date and time values.
trans-unit.target: 每一種`CustomProvider`物件用來將物件陣列中的項目轉換成日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: The output indicates that the `CustomProvider` object is used in the conversion only when the type of the `value` parameter is a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 輸出會指出`CustomProvider`轉換中使用物件時，才的型別`value`參數是<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a valid date and time value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是日期及時間值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援轉換。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent date and time, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The date and time equivalent of the value of <paramref name="value" />, or the date and time equivalent of <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 值相等的日期和時間；如果 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> 為 <paramref name="value" />，則為與 <see langword="null" /> 相等的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts string representations of date values with the `ToDateTime` method, using an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將轉換的日期值的字串表示法`ToDateTime`方法，使用<xref:System.IFormatProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a properly formatted date and time string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是正確的日期和時間字串格式。

trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to an equivalent decimal number, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為相等的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: A decimal number that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的十進位數字；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToDecimal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToDecimal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Temperature` class that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例定義一個實作 `Temperature` 介面的 <xref:System.IConvertible> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows that when a `Temperature` object is passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.Convert.ToDecimal%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method, the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToDecimal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of the `Temperature` class is called to perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示當`Temperature`物件傳遞為參數，以<xref:System.Convert.ToDecimal%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，<xref:System.IConvertible.ToDecimal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作`Temperature`類別呼叫以執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in an appropriate format for a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是使用 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 型別的適當格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent decimal number, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: A decimal number that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的十進位數字；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.Decimal.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Decimal.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Decimal.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert an array of strings to <xref:System.Decimal> values by using <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> objects that represent two different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將字串的陣列轉換<xref:System.Decimal>藉由使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>代表兩個不同的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a number in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是有效格式的數字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified value to a double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Boolean value to the equivalent double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: The number 1 if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則為數字 1，否則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts a <xref:System.Boolean> value to a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Boolean>值設定為<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit unsigned integer to the equivalent double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: The double-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數，其與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts a <xref:System.Byte> value to a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Byte>值設定為<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法一律會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.target: 將指定之十進位數字的值，轉換為相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數，其與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts a <xref:System.Decimal> value to a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Decimal>值設定為<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: The double-precision floating-point number to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified double-precision floating-point number; no actual conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的雙精確度浮點數，不執行實際的轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is returned unchanged.

trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件，或是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to a double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之物件的值，轉換為雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的雙精確度浮點數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is not `null`, this method wraps a call to the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToDouble%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`不`null`，這個方法會包裝呼叫<xref:System.IConvertible.ToDouble%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的基礎類型的實作`value`。

trans-unit.target: 單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.target: 將指定之單精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Single>值設定為<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的雙精確度浮點數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Convert.ToDouble%28System.String%29> method is equivalent to passing `value` to the <xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Convert.ToDouble%28System.String%29>方法相當於傳遞`value`至<xref:System.Double.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: `value` is interpreted by using the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: `value` 是使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例來解譯。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Double.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Double.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToDouble%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToDouble%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `value` is a <xref:System.String> that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`value`是<xref:System.String>表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> and a class that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義一個類別，實作<xref:System.IConvertible>和類別可實作<xref:System.IFormatProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Objects of the class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> hold an array of <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 實作類別的物件<xref:System.IConvertible>保存陣列<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: An object of each class is passed to the `ToDouble` method.
trans-unit.target: 每個類別的物件傳遞至`ToDouble`方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an average of the array of <xref:System.Double> values, using the object that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider> to determine how to calculate the average.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回一維陣列的平均<xref:System.Double>，使用值實作的物件<xref:System.IFormatProvider>來判斷如何計算平均。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in an appropriate format for a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是使用 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 型別的適當格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent double-precision floating-point number, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的雙精確度浮點數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.Double.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Double.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Double.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts string representations of <xref:System.Double> values with the `ToDouble` method, using an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的字串表示法<xref:System.Double>值與`ToDouble`方法，使用<xref:System.IFormatProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a number in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是有效格式的數字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified value to a 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Boolean value to the equivalent 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The number 1 if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則為數字 1，否則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts the Boolean values `true` and `false` to <xref:System.Int16> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的布林值`true`和`false`至<xref:System.Int16>值。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit unsigned integer to the equivalent 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of <xref:System.Byte> values to a 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Byte>16 位元帶正負號的整數值。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified Unicode character to the equivalent 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 Unicode 字元值轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Char> values to a 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Char>16 位元帶正負號的整數值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The date and time value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法一律會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified decimal number to an equivalent 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之十進位數字的值，轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，捨入至最接近的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Decimal> values to a 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Decimal>16 位元帶正負號的整數值。

trans-unit.source: The example illustrates that any fractional part of a <xref:System.Decimal> value is rounded when performing the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 該範例會說明的任何小數部分<xref:System.Decimal>執行轉換時，會捨入值。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.target: 將指定之雙精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 32 位元帶正負號的整數值轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 將指定之物件的值，轉換為 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.

trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 16-bit unsigned integer to the equivalent 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of unsigned 16-bit integers to a 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將不帶正負號的 16 位元整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 32-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 32-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 32 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of unsigned integers to a 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將不帶正負號整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 64-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 64 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of unsigned long integers to a 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將不帶正負號的長整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to a 16-bit signed integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `value` is a <xref:System.String> that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`value`是<xref:System.String>表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> and a class that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義一個類別，實作<xref:System.IConvertible>和類別可實作<xref:System.IFormatProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Objects of the class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> hold an array of <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 實作類別的物件<xref:System.IConvertible>保存陣列<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: An object of each class is passed to the `ToInt16` method.
trans-unit.target: 每個類別的物件傳遞至`ToInt16`方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an average of the array of <xref:System.Double> values, using the object that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider> to determine how to calculate the average.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回一維陣列的平均<xref:System.Double>，使用值實作的物件<xref:System.IFormatProvider>來判斷如何計算平均。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in an appropriate format for an <see cref="T:System.Int16" /> type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是使用 <see cref="T:System.Int16" /> 型別的適當格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 沒有實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 16-bit signed integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Int16.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Int16.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts string representations of 16-bit integers with the `ToInt16` method, using an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的 16 位元整數的字串表示`ToInt16`方法，使用<xref:System.IFormatProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: The base of the number in <c>value</c>, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 中數字的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified base to an equivalent 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定基底中數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 16 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X".
trans-unit.target: 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the <xref:System.Convert.ToInt16%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation.
trans-unit.target: 因為非基底 10 數值表示，不支援負號<xref:System.Convert.ToInt16%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法會假設負數使用二的補數表示法。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the method always interprets the highest-order binary bit of an integer (bit 15) as its sign bit.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，此方法一定會將最高順序二進位位元的整數 （位元 15） 解譯其正負號位元。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the <xref:System.Int16> data type is converted to an <xref:System.Int16> value without the method throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出範圍的<xref:System.Int16>資料類型轉換成<xref:System.Int16>值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example increments <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> by one, converts the resulting number to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToInt16%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例為增量單位<xref:System.Int16.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，轉換為十六進位字串表示，產生的數字，然後呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToInt16%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x8000 converts to -32768."
trans-unit.target: 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x8000 轉換成-32768。

trans-unit.source: When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value.
trans-unit.target: 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。

trans-unit.source: As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first retrieving the sign of the numeric value before converting it to its hexadecimal string representation.
trans-unit.target: 如下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當地藉由第一個擷取的數值正負號之前將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Throw an exception if the original value was positive but the conversion back to an integer yields a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始值為正數，但是在轉換回整數會產生負數值，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to interpret each element in a string array as a hexadecimal string and to convert it to a 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位字串的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換成 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fromBase" /> is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fromBase" /> 不是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 signed number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，表示非 Base 10 的帶正負號的數字有前置一個負號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> contains a character that is not a valid digit in the base specified by <paramref name="fromBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 所包含的字元在 <paramref name="fromBase" /> 指定的基底中不是有效數字。

trans-unit.source: The exception message indicates that there are no digits to convert if the first character in <paramref name="value" /> is invalid; otherwise, the message indicates that <paramref name="value" /> contains invalid trailing characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 中的第一個字元無效，例外狀況訊息會指出沒有數字可進行轉換；否則訊息會指出 <paramref name="value" /> 包含無效的尾端字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 signed number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，表示非 Base 10 的帶正負號的數字有前置一個負號。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified value to a 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Boolean value to the equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The number 1 if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則為數字 1，否則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts the <xref:System.Boolean> values `true` and `false` to integers.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Boolean>值`true`和`false`為整數。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit unsigned integer to the equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of bytes to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將每個項目中的位元組陣列轉換成整數。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified Unicode character to the equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 Unicode 字元值轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%28System.Char%29> method returns a 32-bit signed integer that represents the UTF-16 encoded code unit of the `value` argument.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%28System.Char%29>方法會傳回 32 位元帶正負號的整數，表示 utf-16 編碼的程式碼單位`value`引數。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is not a low surrogate or a high surrogate, this return value also represents the Unicode code point of value.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`不是低 surrogate，或為高 surrogate，此傳回值也代表 Unicode 字碼指標的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of <xref:System.Char> values to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Char>為整數的值。

trans-unit.source: The date and time value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法一律會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified decimal number to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之十進位數字的值，轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Decimal> values to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Decimal>為整數的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The double-precision floating-point number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified double-precision floating-point number to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之雙精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Double> values to aninteger.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Double>aninteger 的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 16-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 16-bit signed integer to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 16 位元帶正負號的整數值轉換成對等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of 16-bit signed integers to an integer.

trans-unit.target: 傳回未變更的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 64-bit signed integer to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 64 位元帶正負號的整數值轉換成對等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of long integers to an integer.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to a 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之物件的值，轉換為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。
