trans-unit.source: If`value` is not `null`, this method wraps a call to the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`不`null`，這個方法會包裝呼叫<xref:System.IConvertible.ToInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的基礎類型的實作`value`。

The conversion is not supported.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 8 位元帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of signed bytes to an integer.

trans-unit.source: The single-precision floating-point number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified single-precision floating-point number to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之單精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Single> values to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Single>為整數的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%28System.String%29> method is equivalent to passing `value` to the <xref:System.Int32.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.`value`
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%28System.String%29>方法相當於傳遞`value`至<xref:System.Int32.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。`value`

trans-unit.source: is interpreted by using the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 是使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例來解譯。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 32-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 32 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of unsigned integers to a signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將不帶正負號整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將不帶正負號的長整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to a 32-bit signed integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `value` is a <xref:System.String> that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`value`是<xref:System.String>表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> and a class that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義一個類別，實作<xref:System.IConvertible>和類別可實作<xref:System.IFormatProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Objects of the class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> hold an array of <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 實作類別的物件<xref:System.IConvertible>保存陣列<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: An object of each class is passed to the `ToInt32` method.
trans-unit.target: 每個類別的物件傳遞至`ToInt32`方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an average of the array of <xref:System.Double> values, using the object that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider> to determine how to calculate the average.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回一維陣列的平均<xref:System.Double>，使用值實作的物件<xref:System.IFormatProvider>來判斷如何計算平均。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in an appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是適當的格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 沒有實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.Int32.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.Int32.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that recognizes the string "pos" as the positive sign and the string "neg" as the negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件，會將字串"pos"辨識為正號和字串"協商"做為負號。

trans-unit.source: It then attempts to convert each element of a numeric string array to an integer using both this provider and the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> provider for the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 即會嘗試將數字的字串陣列的每個項目轉換成整數使用此提供者和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>文化特性而異的提供者。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: The base of the number in <c>value</c>, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 中數字的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified base to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定基底中數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 32 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X".
trans-unit.target: 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the <xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation.
trans-unit.target: 因為非基底 10 數值表示，不支援負號<xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法會假設負數使用二的補數表示法。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the method always interprets the highest-order binary bit of an integer (bit 31) as its sign bit.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，此方法一定會將整數 （位元 31） 的最高順序二進位位元解譯其正負號位元。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the <xref:System.Int32> data type is converted to an <xref:System.Int32> value without the method throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出範圍的<xref:System.Int32>資料類型轉換成<xref:System.Int32>值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example increments <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> by one, converts the resulting number to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例為增量單位<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，轉換為十六進位字串表示，產生的數字，然後呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x80000000 converts to -2147483648."
trans-unit.target: 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x80000000 轉換成-2147483648。

trans-unit.source: When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value.
trans-unit.target: 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。

trans-unit.source: As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first retrieving the sign of the numeric value before converting it to its hexadecimal string representation.
trans-unit.target: 如下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當地藉由第一個擷取的數值正負號之前將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Throw an exception if the original value was positive but the conversion back to an integer yields a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始值為正數，但是在轉換回整數會產生負數值，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fromBase" /> is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fromBase" /> 不是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 signed number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，表示非 Base 10 的帶正負號的數字有前置一個負號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> contains a character that is not a valid digit in the base specified by <paramref name="fromBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 所包含的字元在 <paramref name="fromBase" /> 指定的基底中不是有效數字。

trans-unit.source: The exception message indicates that there are no digits to convert if the first character in <paramref name="value" /> is invalid; otherwise, the message indicates that <paramref name="value" /> contains invalid trailing characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 中的第一個字元無效，例外狀況訊息會指出沒有數字可進行轉換；否則訊息會指出 <paramref name="value" /> 包含無效的尾端字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 signed number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，表示非 Base 10 的帶正負號的數字有前置一個負號。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified value to a 64-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為相等的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The number 1 if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則為數字 1，否則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts the <xref:System.Boolean> values `true` and `false` to long integers.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Boolean>值`true`和`false`長整數。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將位元組陣列中的每個項目轉換為長整數。

trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 Unicode 字元值轉換為相等的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified decimal number to an equivalent 64-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之十進位數字的值，轉換為相等的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Convert.ToInt64%28System.String%29> method is equivalent to passing `value` to the <xref:System.Int64.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Convert.ToInt64%28System.String%29>方法相當於傳遞`value`至<xref:System.Int64.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: `value` is interpreted by using the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: `value` 是使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例來解譯。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Int64.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Int64.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to a 64-bit signed integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToInt64%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToInt64%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `value` is a <xref:System.String> that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`value`是<xref:System.String>表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> and a class that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義一個類別，實作<xref:System.IConvertible>和類別可實作<xref:System.IFormatProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Objects of the class that implements <xref:System.IConvertible> hold an array of <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 實作類別的物件<xref:System.IConvertible>保存陣列<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: An object of each class is passed to the `ToInt64` method.
trans-unit.target: 每個類別的物件傳遞至`ToInt64`方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an average of the array of <xref:System.Double> values, using the object that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider> to determine how to calculate the average.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回一維陣列的平均<xref:System.Double>，使用值實作的物件<xref:System.IFormatProvider>來判斷如何計算平均。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in an appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是適當的格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 64-bit signed integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit signed integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 64 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.Int64.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.Int64.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an `IFormatProvider` instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是`IFormatProvider`取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `NumberFormatInfo` object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `NumberFormatInfo`物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the `NumberFormatInfo` for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、`NumberFormatInfo`會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Int64.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Int64.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that recognizes the string "pos" as the positive sign and the string "neg" as the negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件，會將字串"pos"辨識為正號和字串"協商"做為負號。

trans-unit.source: It then attempts to convert each element of a numeric string array to an integer using both this provider and the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> provider for the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 即會嘗試將數字的字串陣列的每個項目轉換成整數使用此提供者和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>文化特性而異的提供者。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: The base of the number in <c>value</c>, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 中數字的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified base to an equivalent 64-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定基底中數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit signed integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 64 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X".
trans-unit.target: 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the <xref:System.Convert.ToInt64%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation.
trans-unit.target: 因為非基底 10 數值表示，不支援負號<xref:System.Convert.ToInt64%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法會假設負數使用二的補數表示法。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the method always interprets the highest-order binary bit of a long integer (bit 63) as its sign bit.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，此方法一定會將長整數 （位元 63） 的最高順序二進位位元解譯其正負號位元。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the <xref:System.Int64> data type is converted to an <xref:System.Int64> value without the method throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出範圍的<xref:System.Int64>資料類型轉換成<xref:System.Int64>值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts <xref:System.UInt64.MaxValue> to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToInt64%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.UInt64.MaxValue>其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToInt64%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF converts to -1."
trans-unit.target: 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF 轉換為-1。

trans-unit.source: When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value.
trans-unit.target: 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。

trans-unit.source: As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first determining whether a value represents an unsigned or a signed type when converting it to its hexadecimal string representation.
trans-unit.target: 如下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當是先判斷值是否代表不帶正負號或帶正負號的類型時將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Throw an exception if the original value was an unsigned type but the conversion back to an integer yields a value whose sign bit is on.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始值為不帶正負號的類型，但是在轉換回整數的結果的值的正負號位元為開啟，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to interpret each element in a string array as a hexadecimal string and convert it to a long integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位字串的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換為長整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fromBase" /> is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fromBase" /> 不是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 signed number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，表示非 Base 10 的帶正負號的數字有前置一個負號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> contains a character that is not a valid digit in the base specified by <paramref name="fromBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 所包含的字元在 <paramref name="fromBase" /> 指定的基底中不是有效數字。

trans-unit.source: The exception message indicates that there are no digits to convert if the first character in <paramref name="value" /> is invalid; otherwise, the message indicates that <paramref name="value" /> contains invalid trailing characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 中的第一個字元無效，例外狀況訊息會指出沒有數字可進行轉換；否則訊息會指出 <paramref name="value" /> 包含無效的尾端字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 signed number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，表示非 Base 10 的帶正負號的數字有前置一個負號。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified value to an 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Boolean value to the equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The number 1 if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則為數字 1，否則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts the Boolean values `true` and `false` to signed byte values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的布林值`true`和`false`為已簽署的位元組值。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit unsigned integer to the equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in a byte array to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將位元組陣列中的每個項目轉換成帶正負號的位元組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified Unicode character to the equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 Unicode 字元值轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Char> values to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Char>帶正負號位元組的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The date and time value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法一律會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified decimal number to an equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之十進位數字的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Decimal> values to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Decimal>帶正負號位元組的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The double-precision floating-point number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified double-precision floating-point number to an equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之雙精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Double> values to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Double>帶正負號位元組的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 16-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 16-bit signed integer to the equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 16 位元帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of signed 16-bit integers to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將帶正負號的 16 位元整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成帶正負號的位元組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 32-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 32-bit signed integer to an equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 32 位元帶正負號的整數值轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of signed integers to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將帶正負號整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成帶正負號的位元組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 64-bit signed integer to an equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 64 位元帶正負號的整數值轉換成對等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of long integers to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將長整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成帶正負號的位元組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件，或是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to an 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之物件的值，轉換為 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToSByte%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToSByte%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an object array to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將物件陣列中的每個項目轉換成帶正負號的位元組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in an appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是適當的格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit signed integer to return.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified 8-bit signed integer; no actual conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 8 位元帶正負號的整數；不會執行實際的轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 傳回未變更的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The single-precision floating-point number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified single-precision floating-point number to an equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之單精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Single> values to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Single>帶正負號位元組的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 value 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Convert.ToSByte%28System.String%29> method is equivalent to passing `value` to the <xref:System.SByte.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Convert.ToSByte%28System.String%29>方法相當於傳遞`value`至<xref:System.SByte.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: `value` is interpreted by using the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: `value` 是使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例來解譯。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.SByte.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.SByte.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts string representations of <xref:System.SByte> values with the `ToSByte` method, using default formatting.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的字串表示法<xref:System.SByte>值與`ToSByte`方法，使用預設格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: The 16-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 16-bit unsigned integer to the equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of unsigned 16-bit integers to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將不帶正負號的 16 位元整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成帶正負號的位元組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 32-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 32-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 32 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an integer array to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將整數陣列中的每個項目轉換成帶正負號的位元組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 64-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 64 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of long integers to a signed byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將長整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成帶正負號的位元組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> or less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 或小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to an 8-bit signed integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `value` is a <xref:System.String> that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`value`是<xref:System.String>表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `ByteString` class that stores both signed and unsigned bytes as hexadecimal strings along with a field that indicates the sign of the byte.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`ByteString`類別，以儲存兩者帶正負號和不帶正負號為沿著與欄位，指出位元組的正負號的十六進位字串的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The `ByteString` class implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: `ByteString` 類別會實作 <xref:System.IConvertible> 介面。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IConvertible.ToSByte%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method calls the <xref:System.SByte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method to perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IConvertible.ToSByte%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫<xref:System.SByte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，以執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: If it fails, it throws an <xref:System.OverflowException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果失敗，就會擲回<xref:System.OverflowException>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToSByte%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of the `ByteString` class is called by the <xref:System.Convert.ToSByte%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.IConvertible.ToSByte%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作`ByteString`類別會呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToSByte%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in an appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是適當的格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 8-bit signed integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.SByte.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.SByte.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts string representations of <xref:System.SByte> values with the `ToSByte` method, using an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的字串表示法<xref:System.SByte>值與`ToSByte`方法，使用<xref:System.IFormatProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: The base of the number in <c>value</c>, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 中數字的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified base to an equivalent 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定基底中數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 8 位元帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X".
trans-unit.target: 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the <xref:System.Convert.ToSByte%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation.
trans-unit.target: 因為非基底 10 數值表示，不支援負號<xref:System.Convert.ToSByte%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法會假設負數使用二的補數表示法。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the method always interprets the high-order bit of a byte (bit 7) as its sign bit.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，此方法一定會將一個位元組 （7 位元） 的高序位位元解譯其正負號位元。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the <xref:System.SByte> data type is converted to an <xref:System.SByte> value without the method throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出範圍的<xref:System.SByte>資料類型轉換成<xref:System.SByte>值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts <xref:System.Byte.MaxValue> to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToSByte%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Byte.MaxValue>其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToSByte%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0xff converts to -1."
trans-unit.target: 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0xff 轉換為-1。

trans-unit.source: When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value.
trans-unit.target: 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。

trans-unit.source: As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first determining whether a value represents an unsigned or a signed type when converting it to its hexadecimal string representation.
trans-unit.target: 如下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當是先判斷值是否代表不帶正負號或帶正負號的類型時將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Throw an exception if the original value was an unsigned type but the conversion back to a signed byte yields a value whose sign bit is on.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始值為不帶正負號的類型，但在轉換回帶正負號的位元組會產生其正負號位元的值，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to interpret the elements in a string array as the binary, octal, and hexadecimal representation of numeric values in order to convert them to unsigned bytes.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試解譯為二進位，八進位，將字串陣列中的項目和數字值的十六進位表示法，以便將它們轉換成不帶正負號的位元組。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fromBase" /> is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fromBase" /> 不是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 signed number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，表示非 Base 10 的帶正負號的數字有前置一個負號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> contains a character that is not a valid digit in the base specified by <paramref name="fromBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 所包含的字元在 <paramref name="fromBase" /> 指定的基底中不是有效數字。

trans-unit.source: The exception message indicates that there are no digits to convert if the first character in <paramref name="value" /> is invalid; otherwise, the message indicates that <paramref name="value" /> contains invalid trailing characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 中的第一個字元無效，例外狀況訊息會指出沒有數字可進行轉換；否則訊息會指出 <paramref name="value" /> 包含無效的尾端字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 signed number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，表示非 Base 10 的帶正負號的數字有前置一個負號。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified value to a single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Boolean value to the equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為相等的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: The number 1 if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則為數字 1，否則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts the Boolean values `true` and `false` to <xref:System.Single> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的布林值`true`和`false`至<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit unsigned integer to the equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 單精確度浮點數，與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of byte values to a <xref:System.Single> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的位元組值陣列中每個項目<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法一律會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified decimal number to an equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之十進位數字的值，轉換為相等的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 單精確度浮點數，與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is rounded using rounding to nearest.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 會以捨入為最接近的數字來捨入。

trans-unit.source: For example, when rounded to two decimals, the value 2.345 becomes 2.34 and the value 2.355 becomes 2.36.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在四捨五入為兩個小數位數時，值 2.345 會變成 2.34，而值 2.355 會變成 2.36。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of <xref:System.Decimal> values to a <xref:System.Single> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Decimal>值<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.target: 要轉換的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified double-precision floating-point number to an equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之雙精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.

trans-unit.target: 例如，在四捨五入為兩個小數位數時，值 2.345 會變成 2.34，而值 2.355 會變成 2.36。

trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToSingle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是適當的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Single.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Single.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 8 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit signed integer to the equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 8 位元帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in a signed byte array to a <xref:System.Single> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將轉換成帶正負號的位元組陣列中每個項目<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.source: The single-precision floating-point number to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified single-precision floating-point number; no actual conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的單精確度浮點數，不執行實際的轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 傳回未變更的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的單精確度浮點數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Convert.ToSingle%28System.String%29> method is equivalent to passing `value` to the <xref:System.Single.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Convert.ToSingle%28System.String%29>方法相當於傳遞`value`至<xref:System.Single.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: `value` is interpreted by using the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: `value` 是使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例來解譯。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Single.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Single.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of numeric strings to a <xref:System.Single> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將數字的字串陣列中每個項目<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是有效格式的數字。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Single.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 32-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 32 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換至不帶正負號整數的陣列中每個項目<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 將指定之 64 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為相等的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 單精確度浮點數，與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of unsigned long integers to a <xref:System.Single> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換至不帶正負號長整數的陣列中每個項目<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to an single-precision floating-point number, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的單精確度浮點數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToSingle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToSingle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `value` is a <xref:System.String> that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`value`是<xref:System.String>表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Temperature` class that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例定義一個實作 `Temperature` 介面的 <xref:System.IConvertible> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Its implementation of the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToSingle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns the internal value of a private <xref:System.Single> variable that represents the temperature.
trans-unit.target: 它的實作<xref:System.IConvertible.ToSingle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會傳回私用的內部值<xref:System.Single>溫度表示變數。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how a call to the <xref:System.Convert.ToSingle%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, in turn, calls the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToSingle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of the `Temperature` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToSingle%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法又呼叫<xref:System.IConvertible.ToSingle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作`Temperature`類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in an appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是適當的格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 沒有實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Single.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Single.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent single-precision floating-point number, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的單精確度浮點數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.Single.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.Single.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.Single.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Single.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.IFormatProvider> objects that represent the en-US and fr-FR cultures when it converts the elements in an array of numeric strings to <xref:System.Single> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.IFormatProvider>轉換的數字的字串陣列中的項目時，代表 EN-US 和 FR-FR 文化特性物件<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a number in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是有效格式的數字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.Single.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.Single.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified value to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換成其相等的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Boolean value to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.Boolean.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Boolean.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: It returns <xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType> for `true` values and <xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType> for `false` values.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType>如`true`值和<xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType>如`false`值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the conversion of a <xref:System.Boolean> to a <xref:System.String>, using `ToString`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明的轉換<xref:System.Boolean>至<xref:System.String>，並使用`ToString`。

trans-unit.source: It also illustrates that the string returned by the conversion equals either <xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 它也會說明如何轉換所傳回的字串等於 <xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit unsigned integer to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.DateTime.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: It uses the formatting conventions of the current culture and the "G" format specifier to convert a <xref:System.DateTime> value to its string representation.
trans-unit.target: 它使用目前的文化特性和"G"格式規範的格式設定慣例轉換<xref:System.DateTime>為其字串表示的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of a <xref:System.DateTime> value to a <xref:System.String> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.DateTime>值設定為<xref:System.String>值。

trans-unit.target: 將指定之 32 位元帶正負號的整數值，轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Int32.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: It formats `value` by using the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 格式化`value`使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式設定慣例。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int32%29> method with the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.UInt16%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會比較<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int32%29>方法<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.UInt16%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: It defines a custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that uses the sting "minus" to represent the negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 它會定義自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件，使用字串"負"來代表負號。

trans-unit.source: It converts each element in an integer array to its equivalent string representation using default formatting (the formatting conventions of the current culture) and the custom format provider.
trans-unit.target: 它會將整數陣列中的每個項目轉換為其相等字串表示，使用預設格式 （目前的文化特性的格式化慣例） 和自訂的格式提供者。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 將指定之 64 位元帶正負號的整數值，轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Int64.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in a long integer array to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將長整數陣列中的每個項目轉換為其相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies the value to convert, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供要轉換之值的物件，或是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之物件的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: To convert `value` to its string representation, the method tries to call the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換`value`為其字串表示，此方法會嘗試呼叫<xref:System.IConvertible.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `value` does not implement the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface, the method tries to call the <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`未實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面，方法會嘗試呼叫<xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作`value`。

trans-unit.source: If value does not implement the <xref:System.IFormattable> interface, the method calls the `ToString` method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不會實作<xref:System.IFormattable>介面，這個方法會呼叫`ToString`方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an object array to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將物件陣列中的每個項目轉換為其相等字串表示。

trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.SByte.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將帶正負號之位元組陣列中的每個項目轉換為其相等字串表示。

trans-unit.target: 將指定之單精確度浮點數的值，轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.Single.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Single.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of <xref:System.Single> values to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Single>為其相等字串表示的值。

trans-unit.source: The string to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified string instance; no actual conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的字串執行個體，不執行實際的轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 傳回未變更的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example passes a string to the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.String%29> method and calls the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to confirm that the method returns the original string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例傳遞字串給<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.String%29>方法，呼叫<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以確認，方法會傳回原始的字串。

trans-unit.source: The example also calls the <xref:System.String.IsInterned%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to ensure that the two strings are not identical because the original string is interned.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會呼叫<xref:System.String.IsInterned%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以確保兩個字串不相同，因為實習的原始字串。

trans-unit.target: 將指定之 16 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例將為其相等字串表示轉換的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數值陣列中每個項目。

trans-unit.target: 將指定之 32 位元不帶正負號的整數值，轉換為它的相等字串表示。
