trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.UInt32.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an unsigned integer array to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將不帶正負號的整數陣列中每個項目轉換為其相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit unsigned integer to convert.

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an unsigned long integer array to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將不帶正負號的長整數陣列中每個項目轉換為其相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: An instance of an object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Boolean value to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.Boolean.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Boolean.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: It returns <xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType> for `true` values and <xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType> for `false` values.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType>如`true`值和<xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType>如`false`值。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts a <xref:System.Boolean> value to a <xref:System.String> with the `ToString` method, using an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> object that displays the type of the format provider for which it is called.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Boolean>值設定為<xref:System.String>與`ToString`方法，使用<xref:System.IFormatProvider>顯示的格式提供者，它會呼叫其類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: The example shows that the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> object is not referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示<xref:System.IFormatProvider>未參考物件。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit unsigned integer to its equivalent string representation, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.Byte.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Byte.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an unsigned byte array to its equivalent string representation using the formatting conventions of the en-US and fr-FR cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將不帶正負號的位元組陣列中每個項目轉換為它的相等字串表示使用 EN-US 和 FR-FR 文化特性的格式化慣例。

trans-unit.source: Because the "G" specifier by default outputs only decimal digits in a byte value's string representation, the `provider` parameter does not affect the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: 因為"G"規範，依預設會輸出位元組值的字串表示中，只包含十進位數字`provider`參數不會影響傳回之字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The base of the return value, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of an 8-bit unsigned integer to its equivalent string representation in a specified base.
trans-unit.target: 將 8 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為它在指定基底中的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" /> in base <paramref name="toBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 在基底 <paramref name="value" /> 中 <paramref name="toBase" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: If `toBase` does not equal 10, the string that is returned by the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Byte%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method represents `value` by its magnitude only.
trans-unit.target: 如果`toBase`不等於 10 時，所傳回的字串<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Byte%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法代表`value`依據只有其重要性。

trans-unit.source: If the method is called to create a string that will later be converted back to a number, a corresponding method that assumes a magnitude-only numeric representation should be called to perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法呼叫來建立稍後將會轉換回數字的字串，會假設範圍僅限數值表示法的對應方法應該呼叫來執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Such methods include <xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這類方法包括<xref:System.Convert.ToByte%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Byte.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in a byte array to its equivalent binary, hexadecimal, decimal, and hexadecimal string representations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將位元組陣列中的每個項目轉換成其對等二進位、 十六進位、 十進位和十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="toBase" /> is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toBase" /> 不是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified Unicode character to its equivalent string representation, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之 Unicode 字元的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.Char.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Char.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.target: `provider`參數已忽略。

trans-unit.target: 要轉換的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to its equivalent string representation, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts a <xref:System.DateTime> value to its equivalent string representation in eight different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.DateTime>八個不同的文化特性中的相等字串表示的值。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified decimal number to its equivalent string representation, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之十進位數字的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Decimal.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of <xref:System.Decimal> values to its equivalent string representation in four different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Decimal>四個不同的文化特性中的相等字串表示的值。

trans-unit.source: The double-precision floating-point number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified double-precision floating-point number to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之雙精確度浮點數的值，轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.Double.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於 <xref:System.Double.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of <xref:System.Double> values to its equivalent string representation in four different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Double>四個不同的文化特性中的相等字串表示的值。

trans-unit.source: The 16-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 16-bit signed integer to its equivalent string representation, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之 16 位元帶正負號的整數的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.Int16.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Int16.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> class that defines its negative sign as the string "~" and its positive sign as the string "!".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>類別來定義其負號做為字串 「 ~"和其正號做為字串"！"。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int16%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method to convert each element in an array of 16-bit integers to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int16%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，將 16 位元整數的陣列中每個項目轉換為其相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The conversion uses the invariant culture as well as the custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 轉換會使用文化特性而異，以及自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The 16-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 16 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The base of the return value, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of a 16-bit signed integer to its equivalent string representation in a specified base.
trans-unit.target: 將 16 位元帶正負號整數的值，轉換為它在指定之基底中的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" /> in base <paramref name="toBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 在基底 <paramref name="value" /> 中 <paramref name="toBase" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is positive and `toBase` is 2, 8, or 16, the returned string uses sign-and-magnitude representation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`為正數及`toBase`為 2、 8 或 16，則傳回的字串會使用正負號和大小表示。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is negative and `toBase` is 2, 8, or 16, the returned string uses two's complement representation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是負數，`toBase`為 2、 8 或 16，則傳回的字串會使用二的補數表示法。

trans-unit.source: This means that the high-order bit of the high-order byte (bit 15) is interpreted as the sign bit.
trans-unit.target: 這表示高序位位元的高序位位元 （位元 15） 會解譯為正負號位元。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int16%2CSystem.Int32%29> method is called to create a string that will later be converted back to a number, a corresponding method that assumes a similar numeric representation should be called to perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int16%2CSystem.Int32%29>呼叫方法來建立稍後將會轉換回數字的字串，會假設類似的數值表示法的對應方法應該呼叫來執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Such methods include <xref:System.Convert.ToInt16%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Int16.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這類方法包括<xref:System.Convert.ToInt16%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Int16.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of 16-bit signed integers to its equivalent binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal string representations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將 16 位元帶正負號的整數陣列中每個項目轉換成其對等二進位、 八進位、 十進位和十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="toBase" /> is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toBase" /> 不是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: The 32-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 32-bit signed integer to its equivalent string representation, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之 32 位元帶正負號的整數的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.Int32.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Int32.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> class that defines its negative sign as the string "~" and its positive sign as the string "!".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>類別來定義其負號做為字串 「 ~"和其正號做為字串"！"。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int32%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method to convert each element in an array of integers to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int32%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，將整數的陣列中每個項目轉換為其相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The conversion uses the invariant culture as well as the custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 轉換會使用文化特性而異，以及自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The 32-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The base of the return value, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of a 32-bit signed integer to its equivalent string representation in a specified base.
trans-unit.target: 將 32 位元帶正負號整數的值，轉換為它在指定之基底中的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" /> in base <paramref name="toBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 在基底 <paramref name="value" /> 中 <paramref name="toBase" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is positive and `toBase` is 2, 8, or 16, the returned string uses sign-and-magnitude representation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`為正數及`toBase`為 2、 8 或 16，則傳回的字串會使用正負號和大小表示。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is negative and `toBase` is 2, 8, or 16, the returned string uses two's complement representation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是負數，`toBase`為 2、 8 或 16，則傳回的字串會使用二的補數表示法。

trans-unit.source: This means that the high-order bit of the highest-order byte (bit 31) is interpreted as the sign bit.
trans-unit.target: 這表示最高序位位元組 （位元 31） 的高序位位元會解譯為正負號位元。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method is called to create a string that will later be converted back to a number, a corresponding method that assumes a similar numeric representation should be called to perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>呼叫方法來建立稍後將會轉換回數字的字串，會假設類似的數值表示法的對應方法應該呼叫來執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Such methods include <xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Int32.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這類方法包括<xref:System.Convert.ToInt32%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Int32.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an integer array to its equivalent binary, hexadecimal, decimal, and hexadecimal string representations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將整數陣列中的每個項目轉換成其對等二進位、 十六進位、 十進位和十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="toBase" /> is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toBase" /> 不是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 64-bit signed integer to its equivalent string representation, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之 64 位元帶正負號的整數的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is identical to <xref:System.Int64.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作等同於<xref:System.Int64.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> class that defines its negative sign as the string "~" and its positive sign as the string "!".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>類別來定義其負號做為字串 「 ~"和其正號做為字串"！"。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int64%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method to convert each element in a long integer array to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int64%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，將長整數陣列中的每個項目轉換為其相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The conversion uses the invariant culture as well as the custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 轉換會使用文化特性而異，以及自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit signed integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The base of the return value, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of a 64-bit signed integer to its equivalent string representation in a specified base.
trans-unit.target: 將 64 位元帶正負號整數的值，轉換為它在指定之基底中的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" /> in base <paramref name="toBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 在基底 <paramref name="value" /> 中 <paramref name="toBase" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is positive and `toBase` is not 10, the returned string uses sign-and-magnitude representation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`為正數及`toBase`不是 10，傳回的字串使用的標誌大小表示。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is negative and `toBase` is not 10, the returned string uses two's complement representation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是負數，`toBase`不是 10，傳回的字串使用二的補數表示法。

trans-unit.source: This means that the high-order bit of the highest-order byte (bit 63) is interpreted as the sign bit.
trans-unit.target: 這表示最高序位位元組 （位元 63） 的高序位位元會解譯為正負號位元。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int32%29> method is called to create a string that will later be converted back to a number, a corresponding method that assumes a similar numeric representation should be called to perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int32%29>呼叫方法來建立稍後將會轉換回數字的字串，會假設類似的數值表示法的對應方法應該呼叫來執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Such methods include <xref:System.Convert.ToInt64%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Int64.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這類方法包括<xref:System.Convert.ToInt64%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Int64.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in a long integer array to its equivalent binary, hexadecimal, decimal, and hexadecimal string representations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將長整數陣列中的每個項目轉換成其對等二進位、 十六進位、 十進位和十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="toBase" /> is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toBase" /> 不是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies the value to convert, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供要轉換之值的物件，或是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to its equivalent string representation using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為它的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of <paramref name="value" />, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is an object whose value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的字串表示；如果 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 是值為 <paramref name="value" /> 的物件，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />, the method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，則方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the `value` parameter implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface, the method calls the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`參數實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面，這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.IConvertible.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作`value`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the `value` parameter implements the <xref:System.IFormattable> interface, the method calls its <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果`value`參數實作<xref:System.IFormattable>介面，這個方法會呼叫其<xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作。

trans-unit.source: If `value` implements neither interface, the method calls the `value` parameter's `ToString()` method, and the `provider` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`實作都沒有介面，這個方法會呼叫`value`參數的`ToString()`方法，而`provider`參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is used if the `value` parameter implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> or <xref:System.IFormattable> interface.
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數用如果`value`參數實作<xref:System.IConvertible>或<xref:System.IFormattable>介面。

trans-unit.source: The most common use of the `provider` parameter is to specify culture-specific information used in the conversion of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的用法`provider`參數是指定的轉換使用的特定文化特性資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `value` parameter is a negative decimal number, the `provider` parameter can supply culture-specific information about the notation used for the negative sign and decimal separator.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`value`參數是負的十進位數字，`provider`參數可以提供用於負號和小數點標記法的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The second example in the next section illustrates a format provider that does not supply culture-sensitive formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例下, 一節中的說明的格式提供者，並不提供區分文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Temperature` class that overrides the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method but does not implement the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`Temperature`類別會覆寫<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法但未實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The example illustrates how calls to the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, in turn, call the `Temperature.ToString` method.
trans-unit.target: 本範例會示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，再呼叫`Temperature.ToString`方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Temperature` class that implements the <xref:System.IFormattable> interface but does not implement the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`Temperature`類別可實作<xref:System.IFormattable>介面，但未實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation represents the `Temperature` value in Celsius, Fahrenheit, or Kelvin, depending on the format string.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作代表`Temperature`攝氏、 華氏，或這個類別，根據格式字串的值。

trans-unit.source: The example also defines a `TemperatureProvider` class that implements <xref:System.IFormatProvider> and provides a randomly generated format string that is used by the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation of the `Temperature` class.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會定義`TemperatureProvider`實作類別<xref:System.IFormatProvider>，並提供隨機產生的格式字串，由<xref:System.IFormattable>實作`Temperature`類別。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit signed integer to convert.

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> class that defines its negative sign as the string "~" and its positive sign as the string "!".

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.SByte%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert each element in signed byte array to its equivalent string representation.

trans-unit.target: 轉換會使用文化特性而異，以及自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The single-precision floating-point number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified single-precision floating-point number to an equivalent 16-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之單精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 16-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 16 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an array of <xref:System.String> values to an unsigned 16-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.String>不帶正負號的 16 位元整數的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than zero or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小於零或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 16-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Convert.ToUInt16%28System.String%29> method is equivalent to passing `value` to the <xref:System.UInt16.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Convert.ToUInt16%28System.String%29>方法相當於傳遞`value`至<xref:System.UInt16.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: `value` is interpreted by using the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: `value` 是使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例來解譯。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.UInt16.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.UInt16.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in a numeric string array to a 16-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將數字的字串陣列中每個項目轉換成 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: The 16-bit unsigned integer to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified 16-bit unsigned integer; no actual conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 16 位元不帶正負號整數；不會執行實際的轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 傳回未變更的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The 32-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 32-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 16-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 32 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 16 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of unsigned integers to an unsigned 16-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將不帶正負號整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成不帶正負號的 16 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 64-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 16-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 64 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 16 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of unsigned long integers to an unsigned 16-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將不帶正負號的長整數的陣列中每個項目轉換成不帶正負號的 16 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to a 16-bit unsigned integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToUInt16%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToUInt16%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `value` is a <xref:System.String> that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`value`是<xref:System.String>表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `HexString` class that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface and that is designed to hold the string representation of both 16-bit signed and 16-bit unsigned values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`HexString`類別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面，為了容納這兩個 16 位元帶正負號和 16 位元不帶正負號值的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The class includes a `Sign` property that indicates the sign of its hexadecimal value.
trans-unit.target: 類別包含`Sign`表示正負號的十六進位值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows that a call to the <xref:System.Convert.ToUInt16%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method that passes a `HexString` object as a parameter, in turn, calls the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToUInt16%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of the `HexString` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToUInt16%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法通過`HexString`物件做為參數，又呼叫<xref:System.IConvertible.ToUInt16%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作`HexString`類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in an appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是適當的格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 16-bit unsigned integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking <xref:System.UInt16.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.UInt16.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>上`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.UInt16.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.UInt16.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that recognizes the string "pos" as the positive sign and the string "neg" as the negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件，會將字串"pos"辨識為正號和字串"協商"做為負號。

trans-unit.source: It then attempts to convert each element of a numeric string array to an integer using both this provider and the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> provider for the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 即會嘗試將數字的字串陣列的每個項目轉換成整數使用此提供者和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>文化特性而異的提供者。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: The base of the number in <c>value</c>, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 中數字的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified base to an equivalent 16-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定基底中數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X".
trans-unit.target: 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.UInt16> data type supports unsigned values only, the <xref:System.Convert.ToUInt16%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.UInt16>資料型別支援不帶正負號的值僅<xref:System.Convert.ToUInt16%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。

trans-unit.source: In other words, all 16 bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，所有的 16 位元用來表示數字的值，並正負號位元不存在。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed integer value that is out of the range of the <xref:System.UInt16> data type is converted to a <xref:System.UInt16> value without the method throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的整數值，超出的範圍<xref:System.UInt16>資料類型轉換成<xref:System.UInt16>值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts <xref:System.Int16.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToUInt16%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Int16.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToUInt16%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x8000 converts to 32768."
trans-unit.target: 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x8000 轉換成 32768。

trans-unit.source: When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value.
trans-unit.target: 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律驗證方法或運算子使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use binary representation to interpret a value that uses two's complement representation when converting a hexadecimal string to a <xref:System.UInt16> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明的技巧，確保方法不會不當地使用二進位表示法來轉譯值時，所用二的補數表示十六進位字串轉換成<xref:System.UInt16>值。

trans-unit.source: The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。

trans-unit.source: When the example converts the value to a <xref:System.UInt16> value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 當此範例將值轉換成<xref:System.UInt16>值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the original value was negative), the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 若是如此，並設定其高序位位元 （表示原始值為負），方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to interpret each element in an array of numeric strings as a hexadecimal value and to convert it to an unsigned 16-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位值的數字的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換成不帶正負號的 16 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fromBase" /> is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fromBase" /> 不是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 unsigned number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 代表非 10 進位不帶正負號數字的 <paramref name="value" />，有前置負號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> contains a character that is not a valid digit in the base specified by <paramref name="fromBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 所包含的字元在 <paramref name="fromBase" /> 指定的基底中不是有效數字。

trans-unit.source: The exception message indicates that there are no digits to convert if the first character in <paramref name="value" /> is invalid; otherwise, the message indicates that <paramref name="value" /> contains invalid trailing characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 中的第一個字元無效，例外狀況訊息會指出沒有數字可進行轉換；否則訊息會指出 <paramref name="value" /> 包含無效的尾端字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 unsigned number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 代表非 10 進位不帶正負號數字的 <paramref name="value" />，有前置負號。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified value to a 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Boolean value to the equivalent 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The number 1 if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則為數字 1，否則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts the Boolean values `true` and `false` to unsigned integers.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的布林值`true`和`false`成不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit unsigned integer to the equivalent 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 8 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in a byte array to an unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將位元組陣列中的每個項目轉換成不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified Unicode character to the equivalent 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 Unicode 字元值轉換為相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in a character array to an unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將字元陣列中的每個項目轉換成不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The date and time value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法一律會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified decimal number to an equivalent 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之十進位數字的值，轉換為相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 32 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Single> values to an unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Single>為不帶正負號的整數值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than zero or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小於零或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Convert.ToUInt32%28System.String%29> method is equivalent to passing `value` to the <xref:System.UInt32.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Convert.ToUInt32%28System.String%29>方法相當於傳遞`value`至<xref:System.UInt32.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: `value` is interpreted by using the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: `value` 是使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例來解譯。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.UInt32.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.UInt32.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example interprets the elements in a string array as numeric strings and attempts to convert them to unsigned integers.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會解譯為數值的字串將字串陣列中的項目，並嘗試將它們轉換成不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: The 16-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 16 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 16-bit unsigned integer to the equivalent 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 16 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in an unsigned 16-bit integer array to an unsigned integer value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將 16 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列中每個項目轉換成不帶正負號的整數值。

trans-unit.source: The 32-bit unsigned integer to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified 32-bit unsigned integer; no actual conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 32 位元不帶正負號整數；不會執行實際的轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 傳回未變更的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 64-bit unsigned integer to an equivalent 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 64 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 32 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an unsigned long integer array to an unsigned integer value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將不帶正負號的長整數陣列中每個項目轉換成不帶正負號的整數值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified object to a 32-bit unsigned integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之物件的值轉換為 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />, or zero if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToUInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the underlying type of `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.IConvertible.ToUInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的基礎類型`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `value` is a <xref:System.String> that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`value`是<xref:System.String>表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `HexString` class that implements the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface and that is designed to hold the string representation of both 32-bit signed and 32-bit unsigned values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`HexString`類別可實作<xref:System.IConvertible>介面，為了容納這兩個 32 位元帶正負號和 32 位元不帶正負號值的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The class includes a `Sign` property that indicates the sign of its hexadecimal value.
trans-unit.target: 類別包含`Sign`表示正負號的十六進位值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows that a call to the <xref:System.Convert.ToUInt32%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method that passes a `HexString` object as a parameter, in turn, calls the <xref:System.IConvertible.ToUInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation of the `HexString` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToUInt32%28System.Object%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法通過`HexString`物件做為參數，又呼叫<xref:System.IConvertible.ToUInt32%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作`HexString`類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not in an appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是適當的格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 未實作 <see cref="T:System.IConvertible" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援轉換。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 32-bit unsigned integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之特定文化特性格式資訊，將指定之數字的字串表示轉換為相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the result of invoking <xref:System.UInt32.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on `value`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是叫用的結果<xref:System.UInt32.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>上`value`。

trans-unit.source: `provider` is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance that obtains a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider` 是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>取得的執行個體<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the <xref:System.UInt32.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫<xref:System.UInt32.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: It returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出轉換成功或失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that recognizes the string "pos" as the positive sign and the string "neg" as the negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義自訂<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件，會將字串"pos"辨識為正號和字串"協商"做為負號。

trans-unit.source: It then attempts to convert each element of a numeric string array to an integer using both this provider and the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> provider for the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 即會嘗試將數字的字串陣列的每個項目轉換成整數使用此提供者和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>文化特性而異的提供者。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: The base of the number in <c>value</c>, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 中數字的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified base to an equivalent 32-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定基底中數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to the number in <paramref name="value" />, or 0 (zero) if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 中之數字相等的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X".
trans-unit.target: 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.UInt32> data type supports unsigned values only, the <xref:System.Convert.ToUInt32%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.UInt32>資料型別支援不帶正負號的值僅<xref:System.Convert.ToUInt32%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。

trans-unit.source: In other words, all 32 bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，所有 32 位元用來表示數字的值，並正負號位元不存在。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed integer value that is out of the range of the <xref:System.UInt32> data type is converted to a <xref:System.UInt32> value without the method throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的整數值，超出的範圍<xref:System.UInt32>資料類型轉換成<xref:System.UInt32>值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts <xref:System.Int32.MinValue> to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the <xref:System.Convert.ToUInt32%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換<xref:System.Int32.MinValue>其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫<xref:System.Convert.ToUInt32%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x80000000 converts to 2147483648."
trans-unit.target: 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x80000000 轉換成 2147483648。

trans-unit.source: When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value.
trans-unit.target: 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律驗證方法或運算子使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use binary representation to interpret a value that uses two's complement representation when converting a hexadecimal string to a <xref:System.UInt32> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明的技巧，確保方法不會不當地使用二進位表示法來轉譯值時，所用二的補數表示十六進位字串轉換成<xref:System.UInt32>值。

trans-unit.source: The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。

trans-unit.source: When the example converts the value to a <xref:System.UInt32> value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 當此範例將值轉換成<xref:System.UInt32>值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the original value was negative), the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 若是如此，並設定其高序位位元 （表示原始值為負），方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to interpret each element in an array of numeric strings as a hexadecimal value and to convert it to an unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位值的數字的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換成不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fromBase" /> is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fromBase" /> 不是 2、8、10 或 16。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 unsigned number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 代表非 10 進位不帶正負號數字的 <paramref name="value" />，有前置負號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> contains a character that is not a valid digit in the base specified by <paramref name="fromBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 所包含的字元在 <paramref name="fromBase" /> 指定的基底中不是有效數字。

trans-unit.source: The exception message indicates that there are no digits to convert if the first character in <paramref name="value" /> is invalid; otherwise, the message indicates that <paramref name="value" /> contains invalid trailing characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 中的第一個字元無效，例外狀況訊息會指出沒有數字可進行轉換；否則訊息會指出 <paramref name="value" /> 包含無效的尾端字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, which represents a non-base 10 unsigned number, is prefixed with a negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 代表非 10 進位不帶正負號數字的 <paramref name="value" />，有前置負號。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 代表小於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt32.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified value to a 64-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值轉換為 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Boolean value to the equivalent 64-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的布林值轉換為相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The number 1 if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，則為數字 1，否則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts Boolean `true` and `false` values to unsigned long integers.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將布林值，轉換`true`和`false`不帶正負號之長整數的值。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換之 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified 8-bit unsigned integer to the equivalent 64-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 8 位元不帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit signed integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in a byte array to an unsigned long integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將位元組陣列中的每個項目轉換成不帶正負號的長整數。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified Unicode character to the equivalent 64-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 Unicode 字元值轉換為相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts each element in a character array to an unsigned long integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將字元陣列中的每個項目轉換成不帶正負號的長整數。

trans-unit.source: The date and time value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method always throws <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法一律會擲回 <see cref="T:System.InvalidCastException" />。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: No value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個轉換。

trans-unit.source: The decimal number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified decimal number to an equivalent 64-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之十進位數字的值，轉換為相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 64-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 64 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of <xref:System.Decimal> values to an unsigned long integer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試將陣列中的每個項目<xref:System.Decimal>不帶正負號的長整數的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than zero or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt64.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 小於零或大於 <see cref="F:System.UInt64.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The double-precision floating-point number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified double-precision floating-point number to an equivalent 64-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之雙精確度浮點數的值，轉換為相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" />, rounded to the nearest 64-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，四捨五入為最接近的 64 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is halfway between two whole numbers, the even number is returned; that is, 4.5 is converted to 4, and 5.5 is converted to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 介於兩個整數正中間時，則傳回偶數；也就是 4.5 會轉換為 4，5.5 會轉換為 6。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 16 位元帶正負號整數的值，轉換為相等的 64 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 32 位元帶正負號的整數值轉換為相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="value" /> 相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following example attempts to convert each element in an array of integers to an unsigned long integer.
